Kỹ năng, phẩm chất: Khả năng tư duy logic. Kỹ năng tương tác và giao tiếp tốt.

description:
Tham mưu cho lãnh đạo phòng, kiểm soát triển khai thực hiện các công việc trong lĩnh vực hoạt động của Phòng được phân công:
A. Nhiệm vụ chuyên môn: 
1. Đối với công tác xây dựng kế hoạch:
Xây dựng kế hoạch kinh doanh, nhiệm vụ trọng tâm, các chỉ tiêu tài chính của toàn Ngân hàng. 
Xây dựng bộ chỉ tiêu/nhiệm vụ , nguyên tắc tính toán, phân bổ chỉ tiêu, giao nhiệm vụ đến các Khối.
Xây dựng phương án/nguyên tắc phân bổ kể hoạch đến các Chi nhánh, phối hợp các Khối kinh doanh phân bổ và giao kế hoạch chi nhánh.
Xây dựng phương án đánh giá, theo dõi, tổng hợp kết quả thực hiện kế hoạch kinh doanh của toàn ngân hàng, các khối, chi nhánh.
Kiểm soát, thực hiện tổng hợp, phân tích hiệu quả hoạt động của các đơn vị, chi nhánh.
Cung cấp số liệu và thông tin về kế hoạch, kết quả kinh doanh theo yêu cầu của Lãnh đạo Khối, Trưởng phòng.
2. Đối với công tác quản lý hiệu suất:
Chỉ đạo tổng hợp, đánh giá NSLĐ các đơn vị kinh doanh
Cho ý kiến về các nội dung liên quan đến kế hoạch và KPIs của các Khối.
3. Soạn thảo các quy trình, quy chế liên quan đến công tác giao và đánh giá kế hoạch.
4. Đưa ra các đề xuất, giải pháp hiệu quả trong lĩnh vực được phân công.
B. Nhiệm vụ quản lý:
Lập kế hoạch công việc phụ trách và phân công công việc cán bộ nhân viên.
Đào tạo và hỗ trợ chyên môn các cán bộ cấp dưới nhằm đắp ứng yêu cầu công việc được giao.
C. Thực hiện các công việc khác do Phó phòng phụ trách trực tiếp hoặc Trưởng phòng phân công.
requirements:
Bằng cấp: Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành kinh tế/ kế hoạch/ tài chính/ ngân hàng.
Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn, quản lý: Tối thiểu 03 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực Ngân hàng/ tài chính/kế toán (ít nhất 1 năm tại Ngân hàng). Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm quản lý Bộ phận/Nhóm.
Kiến thức chuyên môn: Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm về công tác lập kế hoạch.
Kỹ năng, phẩm chất: Kỹ năng phân tích, tương tác và giao tiếp tốt. Sử dụng thành thạo word, excel, power point. Chăm chỉ và chịu được áp lực công việc

description:
ENGLISH VERSION

If you would like to apply for this job, please copy and paste the following URL into your browser: https://tiny.pl/cjbc9  The direct applications via that link will be prioritized.

1.  IT Infra Engineer supporting IT infrastructure for HcP Departments, covering BackEnd & FrontEnd, including ITM/ITL Technical support.
    • Ensure 24x7 KTBR (Keep the Business Running) & operation excellence for HcP's IT Infrastructure including servers, workstations, DB, networking and IT equipment, etc. 
    • Perform service request fulfillment, technical consultancy, incident & problem management, change management for IT infra topics at plant.
    • Responsible for IT infra capacity planning, budgeting, project management, IT asset management, DRP/ BCP, and continuous improvement for responsible services
2.  DSP - Data Security Professional (Proxy): Ensure IT compliance for HcP User Departments and IT systems, including but not limited to ISP (Information Security & Privacy) and ITM/ITL (IT for Manufacturing & Laboratory):
    • Manage AIM (Authorization and Identity Management) for user departments & IT system.
    • Ensure ISP (Information Security and Privacy) compliance for HcP. Maintain IT compliant documentations & processes. Perform IT compliance related self-check and audit.
    • Coordinate IT compliance related activities & projects for HcP. Ensure IT compliance awareness for HcP users via training/ communication.
3. Other tasks:
    • Additional responsibilities, tasks, projects assigned by leader.
requirements:
Qualifications

1. Education
    • Bachelor's degree. Major in IT
    • Relevant professional certificates from Microsoft/ Cisco/ Oracle...are good plus.
2. Work experience
    • 3 to 5-years-experience in related scope of works:  IT Infra FrontEnd/ BackEnd Operation Management.
    • Solid experience in SQL DB & Oracle DB administration is strong plus.
    • Experience in IT security management
3. Traits and Skills
    • IT Infrastructure Administration, including Windows Server & Client OS, Networking, VMware server.
    • Database administration: Microsoft SQL Database, Oracle database 
    • IT Security Administration 
    • Good documentation & ITIL experience 
    • Effective communication in English & Vietnamese (speaking, listening, reading & writing). 
    • Effective and smooth collaboration with customers, partners and suppliers. 
    • A team player. Easy to work with. Participate team's and company's team building activities. 
    • Discipline. Integrity. Disagreed but commit.  
    • Analytical thinking. Self-learning capability, Knowledge transfer capability 
    • Customer Orientation. Result Orientation. Quality. Cost sensitivity  
    • Ready for travel when needed (for training/ project/ cross-site support)


Additional Information

    • Shuttle buses are provided from various locations of HCMC and Bien Hoa City
    • 15+ days of annual leaves
    • Attractive salary package, allowances and bonuses
    • Premium healthcare insurance for employees and 2 direct relatives
    • On-the-job training and coaching

description:
-	Designing and supervising printing of proposals and communication publications (internal/external) such as poster, brochure, banner, standee, cover photos, infographics…for company’ campaigns or staff activities & products.

-	Discuss with the team to analyze and identify UX problems, regular review and refine UX/UI for improvement and refreshment.
-	Work with the project team to illustrate new features and changes to app/web features by site maps, wireframes, and user flow diagrams.
-	Collaborating effectively with product, technical and management teams.
requirements:

-	Strong understanding and passion for the importance of design thinking & interest in emotional design; has a clear and strong understanding of the importance of user-centered design.
-	Familiar with the fundamental UX of major platforms: iOS, Android, Web, Desktop OS.
-	Financial, Banking industry knowledge is preferred.
-	Being proficient use of Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma…or other visual design tools.
-	Ability to conceptualize and develop visual concepts.
-	A keen eye for aesthetics and details. Open-minded, willing to learn & proactive, can work independently as well as in a team.
-	Hard work, commitment, able to work well under pressure.

Benefits:

-	Professional training courses of most up-to-date technologies; 
-	Domestic & overseas technology workshops & conferences;

•	Comprehensive insurance (PTI healthcare & accident insurance)
•	Summer leave.
•	Staff & family Events.

description:
- Review business requirements and deliver detailed requirement analyses in accurate and timely manner. Highlight any requirement conflict and propose optimal solution to client.
- Attend project meeting with Business Users for requirement gathering (note: travelling might be required).
- Deliver document write-up such as Business Requirement Document, Functional Specification Document, User Guide, Feature Study and other document that might be required.
- Work closely with various teams to ensure proper understanding of the business requirements so that feature can be delivered on time.
- Work closely with colleagues, developers, testers and a variety of Stakeholders to ensure technical compatibility and user satisfaction.
- Liaise actively with Business Users for any requirement clarification, issue highlight as well as project discussion.
- Assist in software quality assurance and testing in all testing environments as well as the Production environment.
- Provide mentoring/training where necessary.
requirements:
***SKILL & EXPERIENCE:
- Critical thinking ability and strong problem-solving capacity.
- Strong knowledge FMCG and AGRO solutions
- Familiar with and possess hands-on experience in writing Software Development Requirement Document as well as Functional Specification document and in preparing UI mock-up.
- Good knowledge of testing processes and methodologies. Preferably with a minimum of 2 years of experience in Software Web Testing.
- Possess good analytical skill, able to think in systematic manner and pay attention to details.
- Strong interpersonal and communications skills, both oral and written. Able to express ideas clearly and concisely.
- Proficient English skill, both oral and written.
- Able to work in a dynamic and ever-changing industry. Friendly personality who can cooperate well with other team members and able to adapt well to changes.
- Fast learner, a self-initiated and pro-active team player who can work with minimal supervision.
- Possess excellent time-management and task-management skill. Able to multi-task.
- Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines.
- Willing to travel for business meeting (inclusive of overseas travel).
- Possessing leadership experience is a plus

***REQUIREMENT:
- Degree in IT/Computer Science/Computer Engineering or related discipline.
- At least 3 - 4  years of experience as Business Analyst (BA). 
- Possess hands-on experience in handling business requirements directly with Business Users.

***Những thông tin khác:
1/ Thử việc: Thử việc: 60 ngày
Thời gian làm việc: Từ thứ Hai đến thứ sáu, từ 8:00 am đến 5:00 pm. Thứ 7 (linh hoạt)
2/ Cơ hội huấn luyện:
- Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo tập trung theo kế hoạch đào tạo năm của công ty.
- Được đề xuất tham gia các khóa đào tạo chuyên môn phù hợp với lộ trình phát triển nghề nghiệp.
- Cơ hội được training on the job với các anh/chị quản lý nhiều năm kinh nghiệm

3/ Đồng nghiệp:
- Hòa đồng, thân thiện và hỗ trợ trong công việc.
- Năm giá trị cốt lõi Betrimex hướng đến: Chính trực, trách nhiệm, hiệu quả, đội nhóm và đổi mới.

4/Ngày nghỉ

description:
We are looking for experienced Back-end Engineers (Java) to join our VinShop product. This is a fantastic opportunity to work at a well-established and leading start-up in Vietnam as One Mount Group and you will be part of VinShop - the pioneer in modernizing distribution & its infrastructure to provide business solutions and sales & ordering platform for Superior Profitability, Services & Experience for FMCG Suppliers and GT* Retailers.

*** Responsibilities

- Writing clean & high-quality code
- Maintain & improve running- functionality as well as design and develop new system, new feature if needed
- Deliver end-to-end, including unit test, integration test and deployment to PROD
- Participate in code reviews & control coding quality standards
requirements:
*** Qualifications

- 5+ years of handson development experience in Java and its frameworks (Spring Framework, Spring boot)
- Good knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms
- Expertise in SQL / NoSQL Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Experience with RESTful APIs, Microservices
- Familiarity with Redis, Kafka
- Experience with Docker/Kubernetes and Cloud Infrastructure is a plus
- Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
- Experience with the system for B2C/B2B business model is a big plus

*** Benefit and Perks

1. Salary & Allowances

- Competitive income, lunch allowance, 13 fixed months salary, performance bonus and gift on special occasion. 
- Annual performance review
- Annual leave: 15 -20  days/year and other leaves/public holidays in accordance with the Labor Law of Vietnam
- Good Insurance added PVI premium healthcare insurance
- Be provided with a high-performance laptop and screen

2. Career Growth

- Opportunity to promptly boost your capability by solving challenging issues of a big tech ecosystem. It’s worth your try.
- Work, interact and learn many tech stacks with excellent product development professionals in a variety of large corporations and startups, with the opportunity to receive on-the-job training.
- Very diverse offline and online seminars & workshops provided by company, supervisors, mentors, and buddies
- Be sponsored to access documents, study online courses and get the certification. 
- Participate in self-development training courses organized by the company regularly.
- Clear and flexible career path

3. Working Environment

- Work in an Agile environment that is extremely flexible and open, eager to incubate any valuable idea.
- Modern and flexible Agile Office fully equipped with gaming, lunch area, personal locker, and open space. No dress code, just shine your way.
- Learning culture, initiatives, and proactive attitude are strongly encouraged at One Mount
- The product team follows the Scrum Agile model, and each team is considered like a small startup with autonomy, self-determination, and high responsibility for the product.
- Team building, company trips, and internal events each month

*** Why You'll Love Working Here

- Be part of an agile team designing and developing high-performance components/micro-services for a wide range of digital transformation projects
- Challenge yourself with high and difficult goals by participating in business models that are unprecedented in the market.
- You will be inspired by not only our Tech start-up culture, but also our talent co-workers and the cutting-edge technologies we applied: 
1. Google cloud platform
2. Micro-service and Kubernetes (K8s)
3. Multi-DC KAFKA event backbones across clusters
4. Big data, Machine learning & modern data platform
5. Hybris Commerce Platform
6. Top-class WMS & TMS systems.
7. Monitor and improve the scalability and security of systems
8. Work with our CI / CD process and give suggestions to improve it

description:
ATTRACTIVE BENEFITS: CHECK FOR MORE DETAILS IN "COMPANY INFO" SECTION

JOB OBJECTIVE 

Management of business applications, provision of the required functionality of applications, provision of inter-faces between the various applications and provision of assistance to end users, in such a way that the applications comply with the requirements/wishes of users and the applications are consistently available. Development of applica-tions including the updating of the functionality and/or modification of existing applications.

EXPECTED RESULTS / FUNCTIONAL ACTIVITIES
1. Determine Business needs 
(*) Core Activities 
Responsibility for the development of applications in such a way that these are linked to the wishes of users. 
- Inventory of user wishes and assessment of the extent to which existing applications link to us-ers' requirements/wishes.
- Discussion of user wishes and the efficiency drive which can be carried out in operating methods with key users and stakeholders and drafting of functional specifications accordingly.
- Drafting of technical specifications based on functional specifications, submission to the Team Leader and if necessary, communicating with external parties. 
- (Coordination of) liaising with the supplier as to whether the required amendment is technically possible in the system, or the desired functional-ity is available. 
- Instructing supplier to generate new versions of applications. Testing (or arranging testing) of new versions of/amendments to applications, drafting a test report and liaising with the user and supplier regarding the results.

(*) Result criteria 
• Degree to which is required information or business needs.
• Propose/recommend solutions to satisfy business needs.

2. Transfer to users
(*) Core Activities 
Responsibility for the transfer to the user organiza-tion, considering the target group.
- Drafting of user instructions coordination and provision of user training to (new) employees, explanation of the new working method and instruction of users in terms of the use of new applications

(*) Result criteria 
- Clearness and efficient
- Document and log the test cases and changes

3. Guidance and troubleshooting 
(*) Core Activities 
Management of applications and the resolution of faults (Incidents, Problems and Changes).
- Resolution of faults, if possible, in conjunction with a supplier/(external); escalation if necessary
- Supervision of the correct use of applications; maintenance of guidelines, documentation and procedures relating to the functional use of applications 
- Control of access to use and the security of applications by the drafting of user definitions, the establishment of authorization levels and so on, establishing clarity etc.  
- Measurement of the performance of an application, identifying discrepancies and reporting them to the ICT team coordinator 
- Monitoring the correct functional operation of the applications responsibility for communication with users

(*) Result criteria 
- Training new users or when new modules implemented.
- Trouble shooting commons issues

4. Assistance provid-ed and administra-tive duties under-taken
(*) Core activities
Carrying out of administrative duties. 
- Global communication with and support for us-ers in the use of applications and undertaking troubleshooting.
- Recording and analyzing fault data and infor-mation 
- Drafting and maintenance of interfaces
- Recording and reporting on the use of applica-tions
- Recording of problems and problem solutions in the help desk system
- Updating basic information in the system
- Drafting and updating manuals for users
- Drafting and updating technical descriptions for tests carried out and amendments made to appli-cations.
- Drafting and updating of department work in-structions and documentation

(*) Result criteria 
- Documenting instructions

5. Enforcement rules
(*) Core activities
- Commit to business and employment regulations
- Clean and maintain orderly workplace
- Commit to HSEQ and safety regulations

(*) Result criteria
- Employment regulations commitments

2.	Quản trị/Quản lý CNTT

description:
We are looking for a Network System Administrator to be part of our expanding team. We are looking for people who share our passion and can help us achieve our goal. As a Network System Administrator, your responsibilites will be: 
-	Administer VMware virtual servers with Windows Server OS, Linux OS, PosgreSQL DB operating systems
-	Administration of Linux-based applications: Wazuh monitoring application, Jabbix, Voice Asterisk application...
-	Install and support users of office applications: mail, web, voip...
-	Install and develop system administration applications, monitoring warnings, and network security
-	Maintaining and administering network system.
-	Contribute to the design, implementation and ongoing management of the corporate infrastructure, including networks, servers.
-	Define, write, and drive the adoption of corporate security policies, especially those focused on network security.
-	Play leading role in developing compromise detection system- IPS/ IDS
-	Performing disaster recovery operations and data backups .
-	Troubleshooting, diagnosing and resolving hardware, network and system problems.
-	Monitoring network performance to determine if adjustments need to be made.
-	R&D new tools and technology and setup monitoring system
requirements:
-	Have at least CCNA/CCNP certificate or equivalent knowledge
-	Strong experience in planning IP address and IP Routing/ Switching/ Packet Filtering
-	Experience in configuring network devices such as Cisco
-	Good knowledge and experience in Networking and Security
-	Have knowledge on Linux, Window, VMware
-	Having Knowledge to advice team and solving technical issue independently
-	Speaking, Writing and Reading English is preferred.

*** Benefits:

-	Competitive salary, 12 paid days annual leave, 2 Saturdays off per month
-	Annual salary review & bonus twice a year. 
-	Domestic & overseas technology workshops & conferences.
-	Others: 
•	Comprehensive insurance
•	Annual teambuilding trips
•	Events for employees & their kids. 
•	Full Insurance as Labor law, 
•	Subvention for lunch, business trip ...

-	Thực hiện bảo trì, gia hạn bản quyền phần mềm, bảo hành,.... cho các thiết bị bảo mật.
-	Biên soạn tài liệu kỹ thuật, vận hành, quy trình, quy định liên quan đến hệ thống bảo mật. Quản lý các tài liệu được phân công thực hiện.
-	Cập nhật nhật ký công việc, nhật ký sự cố, hồ sơ kỹ thuật của hệ thống bảo mật hàng ngày.

description:
JOB OBJECTIVE 

Data engineer is responsible for finding trends in data sets and developing algorithms to help make raw data more useful to the enterprise. This IT role requires a significant set of technical skills, including a knowledge of SQL da-tabase design and analytic programming languages. Data engineer also need communication skills to work across de-partments to understand what business leaders want to gain from the company’s large datasets.

EXPECTED RESULTS / FUNCTIONAL ACTIVITIES

1. Business needs and ob-jectives evaluation

­- Communication with Business analysts or Business users for collecting require-ments.
­- Assists in the collection and consolidation of required information and data
- Degree to which is required infor-mation or data
- Processing of business data evalu-ation and estimation

2. Data preparation
­- Analyze and organize raw data . 
­- Combine raw information from different sources
­- Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability
- Clearness and efficient data model
- Documentation the data sources and used logics

3. Reporting using provid-ed analytical tools
­- Conduct data analysis and report on re-sults with business analysts or business users
­- Testing the data model and performance of the report to ensure that they are fit for use.
- Visualization the data
- Working with business analysts or business users for Test result

description:
SUMMARY 
Internal business title: Customer Support Engineer
This role is a part of FORTNA’s 24/7 support system, offering Level 2 customer support with constant availability, efficient issue analysis, resolution, and thorough documentation. You'll actively engage with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to expedite issue resolution, ensuring swift customer feedback.
Daily, you'll work a full 8-hour shift and be on standby for an additional 3 hours as per the resource schedule within the team.  

PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
•	Goal-Oriented Ownership: Take ownership of individual and departmental goals as agreed upon with the Software Manager 
•	Remote Troubleshooting: Provide remote support for legacy WCS (Warehouse Control System) and WES (Warehouse Execution System), solving client issues.
•	Flexible Availability: Be available for customer support during non-standard hours (early morning, weekend), as needed.
•	Effective Communication: Maintain clear communication with clients and stakeholders.
•	Issue Resolution: Documenting Root Cause Analysis and Resolution Steps.
•	Software Stabilization: Contribute to software stabilization by addressing items in the Stability Backlog.
•	Continuous Learning: Stay open-minded, share new techniques, and contribute to productivity improvement.
requirements:
•	Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field.
•	At least 1 years of experience in Java (8 or later), enterprise application development, concurrent programming.
•	Have experience in troubleshooting to solve issues.
•	Proficiency English.
•	Good knowledge of object-orientated analysis and design (OOAD).
•	Have experience with Maven, Github, Linux, Docker, Oracle/Postgres, Message Broker, ESB, RESTful API development, Microservices.
•	Excellent oral and written communication skills and the ability to articulate to project members and stakeholders; must be a team player who works well with technical and non-technical resource.
•	Strong interpersonal, organizational, time management and problem-solving skill.
•	Have experience on maintenance projects as plus point.

BENEFITS
Being an Employee of FORTNA, you are offered:
•	Flexible working hours (5 working days/week) and extra salary for OT according to Vietnam labor law.
•	Competitive salary with annual review and performance bonus
•	100% official salary during the probation period; 13th-month salary
•	Modern facilities with Laptop Dell Precision 7670 chip i9-12950HX, Ram 64GB, SSD 512GB, RTX A2000 + 2 monitor Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE
•	Onsite opportunities in the US, UK (1-3 months/year)
•	Annual luxury vacations and monthly Happy Hour 
•	Exciting company outings/events and team building activities, 
•	Outstanding Wellness and English training allowances
•	Bao Viet Premium health-care insurance for employee and 2 dependants. 
•	Sponsored training and self-development opportunities (English, PMP, CSM...)
•	10% paid working time per week for personal development (attending soft skill courses, reading books, working on side projects, self-teaching any new IT-related concepts)
•	Supportive, international, dynamic working environment and talented, culturally diverse teams
•	A large pantry full of snack, drink, and seasonal fresh fruit

Take the deal and let ‘s explore many more benefits!

description:
A member of Data Lake team, responsible to build, develop and maintain the data pipeline of our strategic Big Data platform, Data Lake serving for management needs, business operations of the bank and comply with Data Governance.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Develop and maintain scalable and reliable data pipelines to ingest data from a variety of different data sources into Data Lake, ensure right data format and  adhere to data quality standards, assure the downstream users can get the data quickly

- Develop and maintain highly scalable and extensible Big Data platform which enables collection, storage, modeling, and analysis of massive data sets from numerous channels. Define and maintain data pipeline, data structure, data format to enable business solution

- Develop and enable big data and batch/real-time analytical solutions that leverage emerging technologies.

- Works in a team to build next-generation Hadoop data lake and analytics applications on a group of core Hadoop technologies

- Evaluate new technologies and products, and research to identify opportunities that impact business strategy, business requirements and performance that can accelerate access to data.

- Work with Advanced Analytics Team to plan and execute high-impact actionable insight generation through big data advanced analytics including predictive analytics, advanced Machine Learning Technologies that reduce cost and improve analytics speed to insight by accelerating the pace of Big Data innovation at ACB.

- Ensure proper configuration management and change controls are implemented during code migration.

4.   Relevant Experiences

- Experience with backend microservice, Cloud Computing such as Google, AWS  and big data projects in financial industry is a plus

description:
This role is to safeguard the organization's digital assets through proactive management and swift response to security incidents.
Ensuring robust cybersecurity measures are in place, efficiently handling security incidents, and continuously enhancing the organization's IT security posture

• Continuously monitor security alerts from sources such as IDS/IPS, endpoint security solutions, and other tools.
• Identify, categorize, and respond to security incidents promptly.
• Collaborate with the Incident Response Team in handling and resolving security issues.
• Provide assessments of the urgency and business impact of security incidents.
• Ensure the optimal functioning and consistent delivery of approved cyber security configurations across all units.
• Troubleshoot and resolve network security issues, collaborating with IT and network teams as needed.
• Implement and manage firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and other cyber security tools.
• Conduct routine maintenance checks and updates to ensure the effectiveness of network security tools.
• Test the cyber security solutions, including equipment and software.
• Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration tests.
• Recommend and implement improvements to the organization's security strategy and evaluate potential new security tools and technologies.
• Address and resolve network and information security tickets, tasks, and projects.
• Work closely with the broader SOC team, IT departments, and liaise with vendors and third-party suppliers.
• Maintain logs and create reports on network equipment utilization, security incidents, and other metrics.
• Document SOC processes, procedures, and guidelines.
• Ensure alignment with organizational policies, standards, and regulatory requirements, and assist in security audits and compliance checks.
• Maintain logs, reports, and records of all security events and incidents.
• Create regular reports on network equipment utilization, security incidents, and other key metrics.
• Document and update SOC processes, procedures, and guidelines.
• Stay updated on the latest security threats and technologies.
• Assist in security awareness training for employees and staff
requirements:
• 3+ years in IT, specifically in cybersecurity roles.
• Hands-on experience with security incident responses.
• Familiarity with cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS and understanding their associated security challenges.
• Technical Diploma or Degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or Information Technology.
• Certifications including but not limited to CCNA Security, MCSA Security, CompTIA Security+, CISSP, CEH, or other relevant certifications.
• Familiarity with configuring and managing network firewalls, related security matters on the devices particularly from Cisco, Peplink, Aruba, Fortinet, and Sophos.
• Solid grounding in Endpoint and Server protection platforms.
• Expertise in a range of monitoring tools, ITSM platforms, and backup/DR solutions.
• Exceptional skills in troubleshooting information security issues.
• Great at organizing, prioritizing and multitasking
• Ability to learn and adapt to rapid changes in information technology.
• Strong technical aptitude and ability to research & solve complex issues independently.
• Experienced in preparing written reports, guidelines in English.
• Good interpersonal skills.
• Good English communication skills.
skills: Security Information, Network Configurations, Security System Management, Network Security, SOC

description:
As a Senior Architect, you are responsible for ensuring that the business' requirements are translated into the right technical solution, based on the most suitable systems, frameworks and choice of architecture. This means that you must have an understanding of many different systems and actively follow the technical development in order to be able to match the requirements specification in the best possible way. 

You will typically be responsible for ensuring that the development team complies with the technical framework and delivers good code. You must therefore be sharp in Clean Code principles, Design Patterns, development methods. 

•	Ensure good architecture, well-structured code and good interfaces between the system components 
•	Lay the foundation for the project early in the implementation phase 
•	Plan strategies and designs for various technical areas 
•	Daily meeting with your team to ensure a high technical and business level 
•	Consult with the client in both a hands on & strategic capacity 
•	Management responsibility - the degree depends on your experience from previous jobs

description:
We are an ambitious Data&AI Team committed to delivering exceptional data solutions and services. We are actively seeking a skilled Data Solution Architect to join our team.

As a Data Solution Architect, you will play a vital role in designing, implementing, and maintaining data models and systems. You will work closely with our data team members to extract insights, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in our data solutions.

Key Job Responsibilities:
1. Define policies and establish standards for modelling, structuring, naming, describing, securing, and. formatting data
2. Develop conceptual, logical, and physical data models with associated metadata including data lineage and technical data definitions
3. Lead efforts to implement a reference data and master data management strategy
4. Architecting and designing Big Data platforms on cloud platform
5. Strong understanding and experience building ELT/ETL solutions for both structured and unstructured data sets.
6. Advising clients on latest big data and analytic technologies
7. Work with business and IT leadership to define and document the data architecture for enterprise data assets 
8. Providing Architecture input to pre-sales activities
requirements:
1. Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a Data Engineer/Architect or in a similar role.  
2. Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, data structures, and statistical concepts. 
3. Experience with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation techniques. 
4. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
5. Familiarity with AWS cloud platforms and AWS machine learning services. 
6. Machine Learning Algorithms: Strong understanding of various machine learning algorithms, such as regression, classification, clustering, and deep learning. Familiarity with both traditional statistical models and modern deep learning architectures. 
7. Machine Learning Frameworks and Libraries: Experience with popular machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, or Keras. Ability to implement, train, and fine-tune machine learning models using these tools. 
8. Model Evaluation and Validation: Proficiency in evaluating machine learning models 
9. Data Preprocessing and Feature Engineering: Knowledge of data preprocessing 
10. Data Visualization: Matplotlib, Tableau. 
11. Cloud Platforms and Services: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure 
12. Collaboration and Communication: Strong interpersonal and communication skills
13. Proficient in both written and spoken English & Vietnamese

description:
Role Overview
Our ideal candidate has a background in delivering mobile and/or automotive apps with a customer-centric mindset with the ability to consistently raise the bar on using modern best practices of Android and/or Android Automotive OS. You will play a large role working with the design and development teams from concept to commercialization of new mobile and
in-car products and features. In this role, you will be shipping ground-breaking mobility experiences that delight customers, redefine mobility and achieve Megazone's vision of a clean future for all. Android Automotive OS App Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software components and applications for in-vehicle infotainment. We’re currently looking for a GAS/Android Automotive App Development Engineer to join our team. Proficiency of Kotlin programming languages.

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Experience with Android Automotive OS & Jetpack Library & Compose

description:
KEY ACCOUNTAIBILITIES
•	Develop and execute strategies to grow the Digital Commerce (DC) into a sustainable channel with significant contribution to the overall business of FWD Vietnam. 
•	Own FWD e-commerce platform and drive continuous improvements of end-to-end customer journeys to deliver market leading customer experience at all touch points, optimize conversions and lifetime value generation from customer portfolio. 
•	Build and develop a capable DC team to drive channel aspirations in the medium and long-term.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
•	Commercial leadership: Initiate and implement ongoing digital campaigns (targeting specific segments) to drive efficient customer acquisition and deliver sales targets across the channels/ models.
•	Digitally Assisted Sales (DAS): Work with Offline channels (e.g. Agency, Banca, IFA) to align and optimize digital sales opportunities via Offline to Online and Online to Offline models (digitally assisted sales).
•	Partnership management:  Develop digital partnerships and work with partners to deliver the strategic goals and KPIs set for the partnerships. This includes existing bank partners and non-bank digital partners
•	Platform/customer journey ownership: Work with internal and external business partners to design and continuously improve customer journeys of FWD digital commerce platform to deliver market leading customer experience and optimize conversions.
•	Build commercial content hub and relevant digital tools (e.g. marketing automation) to drive customer engagement and nurturing and build pipeline of leads for conversion/ upsell/cross-sell (farming capability). 
•	Work with Product Propositions team to identify product opportunities and develop the product range for DC channel (including product packaging).
•	Leverage available data analytics (both local, FWD group and our partners) and new technologies (e.g. AI) to optimize business results.
•	Manage channel budget and drive optimization of acquisition cost.

•	Experience in developing and managing partnerships.

description:
What you will do

- Responsible for promoting and supporting Scrum by helping everyone understand Scrum theory, practices, principles, and values.

- Ensure that the Scrum process works well and properly.

- Coach the team on how to use Scrum practices and values to delight customers.

- Work closely with the developers and Product Owner to ensure an Agile culture is established in your team.

- Coach the scrum team in self-organization.

- Identify gaps in the Agile process or skills to improve on, to make the team work better.

- Collaborate closely with the Product Owner to manage the product backlog.

- Facilitate scrum events and other meetings as needed, e.g. product backlog refinement, sprint planning, daily scrum, sprint review, sprint retrospective.

- Facilitate getting the work done without coercion, assigning, or dictating the work.

- Facilitate discussion, decision making, and conflict resolution.

- Remove impediments or guide the team to remove impediments.

- Provide all support to the team using a servant leadership style whenever possible.

- Help the scrum team achieve higher levels of scrum maturity.

- Build a trusting and safe environment where problems can be raised without fear of blame, retribution, or being judged.

- Help build a productive environment where team members ‘own’ the product and enjoy working on it.

- ​​Helping the Scrum team achieve the Sprint Goal for every sprint.

- Helping the Scrum team deliver the Increment with the Definition of Done

- Motivate/ encourage the scrum team to improve continuously.

- Pay attention to the motivation of team members every day and improve their motivation if there are any low-motivated members.

- Work with other Scrum Masters to increase the effectiveness of applying Scrum in the Organization.

- Quản lý an toàn kỹ thuật. Xây dựng kế hoạch đào tạo, tuyển dụng nhân sự, nâng cao chuyên môn cho thành viên trong nhóm. Phân bổ công việc cho nhân viên cấp dưới, chỉ đạo, hướng dẫn để họ hoàn thành tốt công việc của mình

- Xử lý tốt các sự cố, rủi ro phát sinh. Đảm bảo công tác kỹ thuật luôn tuân thủ quy tắc, tiêu chuẩn.
- Trực tiếp phụ trách triển khai các dự án, quản lý và giám sát nhà thầu phụ. Trực tiếp làm hồ sơ hoàn công các dự án (Bản vẽ hoàn công, nhật ký thi công)

description:
Data Analyst
Our Data Analytics team is empowered to build unique and compelling products/users/business insights using machine learning and data. The work done by our Data Analysts is highly sought after as the business sees the Data Analysts as partners in their journey who drive and create a tremendous impact on the business.

What you will do?
- You will be working collaboratively to use data to positively inform and influence the business decisions at PropertyGuru.
- You will use the data to create compelling narratives to help drive action. For example, why do certain property listings get significantly higher page views than their peers? What actions do consumers/users browsing on the property take before they zero in on the right property? These are some of the many questions that get asked of our data analyst team in PropertyGuru. These questions drive our product development decisions and inform and recommend action items for marketing, advertising campaigns, and product development.
- You will also be taking part in evaluating and reporting the key business metrics for the businesses. You will spend time understanding the drivers of the metrics to help the stakeholders understand the potential reasons and hypotheses for the changes. Some of these are related to the A/B experimentations performed on the users and products as part of their development.
- Since most of these analyses are driving important decisions, you will need to ensure that these analyses are repeatable and accessible to all with appropriate documentation.
requirements:
Required
- Minimum 5 years of industry experience in working with large-scale datasets.
- Analytical and structured thinking (must have).
- Communication skills: Can explain the data from a business perspective, and communicate clearly and effectively to cross-functional business partners of varying technical levels. Good data storytelling skills and be able to handle stakeholders’ expectations.
- Result-oriented and get-things-done mindset. “We push beyond good” and “we own it and deliver it” are our working culture.
- Have experience with deep dive and advanced analytics, for example, forecasting model, customer segmentation, and customer behaviors analysis.
- The data analyst must be willing to work with unclean data. We have a lot of new features per quarter, which means DA must be prepared to work with new, unprocessed data.
- Knowledge of SQL is a must. You must write custom queries to pull data from BigQuery to support your analyses and hypothesis.
- Build clear and simple dashboards and presentations. We currently use Tableau and Looker for reporting and visualizations.
- English language is fluent, some of your stakeholders are foreigners and will require you to document your works and present them in English.
- Have a good business mindset, love to solve business questions and are eager to make an impact

Optional
- Experience working with Google Analytics, Google tag manager is a plus.
- Experience in Python, Airflow, and Gitlab is a plus. This is not a must-have requirement, but good to have if you aspire to grow as a data analyst.
- Familiar with Jira and using Kanban to manage tasks.
- Experience working with Technology product/platform
skills: SQL, Python, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, English

benefits: We offer competitive salary and benefits package

description:
Do you like helping enterprise clients implement innovative cloud solutions and solve technical problems? Do you want to be the leader and demonstrate how the emerging technologies (such as A.I., Big Data, Cloud, DevOps) can be applied to businesses? 

With business growth and global expansion opportunities, we are looking for a highly motivated Data Engineer to help accelerate our growing technical team. This is an excellent opportunity to join a world-class technical team, working with some of the best and brightest engineers and account managers while also developing your skills and furthering your career within one of the most innovative and progressive technology young companies in APAC.

1. Enable effective decision making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources and compiling it into a digestible and actionable format.
2. Measure the metrics of business and visualize the metrics into Business Intelligence.
3. Perform high performance data discovery, big data analytics, defining transformation logic and 
data model.
4. Provide End-to-end data design and management for data acquisition and processing, data quality, and governance for the Enterprise Data platform.
5. In depth research of defect trends
6. Data collection and entry as needed
7. Data mining and statistical techniques to develop insights and transformational outcomes, visualize data and insight.
8. Translating data mining results into a clear business-focused deliverables.
9. Perform key technical consultant role in the areas of advanced big data techniques, including data modelling, data access, data integration, data visualization, data mining, data discovery, statistical methods, database design and implementation.
requirements:
1. Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science Business Administration, Information Systems, Statistics, Mathematics, or related degrees.
2. With at least 1 to 5 years of experience as Data Engineer.
3. Strong data analytics experience with proficiency in SQL / Python / R
4. Ability to understand end-to-end Data Architecture including Data Extraction, Data Transformation, and Data Modelling.
5. Hands-on experience to design enterprise data platforms and solutions incorporating Big Data, AI System and Cloud (AWS is a plus).
6. Proficiency with Modern Cloud Data Warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, Redshift)
7. Experience in AI/ML is a plus
8. Excellent written and oral communication skills in both Vietnamese and English.

Note: Candidates with more than 5 years of experience as Data Engineer and with management exposure may be considered for managerial level.

description:
*** What You Will Do

- Kiến trúc và phát triển hệ thống thương mại điện tử toàn cầu trên nền Web và Mobile, multi-domain, multi-languages với lượng traffic dữ liệu cực lớn (hơn 5 triệu sản phẩm). Lập trình mảng micro service.
- Có cơ hội đảm trách tất cả các kỹ năng cần có của full-stack developer từ xây dựng yêu cầu đến release và vận hành hệ thống trên môi trường thực theo tiêu chuẩn Nhật Bản về qui trình và chất lượng.
- Dự án product nên có cơ hội đề xuất và hiện thực những ý tưởng hay, hợp lý và hiệu quả nhằm hoàn thiện sản phẩm
requirements:
*** What You Are Good At

Thành thạo lập trình Web với ngôn ngữ lập trình PHP:
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với framework Laravel ,EC-Cube, hoặc Framework tương tự.
- Có kinh nghiệm về HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Bootstrap Responsive
- Có kinh nghiệm về framework Javascript như: Jquery, React/Vue/Angular
- Có kinh nghiệm về LAMP, Network, and Security.
- Ưu tiên những ứng cử viên có kinh nghiệm trên một năm làm về Web EC.
- Hiểu biết về Mysql (có kinh nghiệm làm việc với database với số lượng bản ghi lớn là một lợi thế)
- Biết thêm Java là một lợi thế.

*** Phúc lợi:
+ Thời gian làm việc: 8:00 ~ 17:00 từ thứ 2 ~ thứ 6. ( Hiếm khi ít OT)
+ Lương thử việc bằng 100% lương chính thức.
+ Đánh giá lương: 1 lần/năm. Bonus tháng 13.
+ Bảo hiểm bắt buộc được đóng trên lương gross.
+ Cơ hội được công ty đài thọ toàn phần đi onsite tại Nhật Bản trong 3 tháng.
+ Du lịch hàng năm.
+ Được training và giao cơ hội thực hiện các kỹ năng để trở thành cấp quản lý cấp cao.
+ Chế độ chu cấp kinh phí tham gia các lớp nâng cao kiến thức kỹ thuật, softskill tại các trung tâm đào tạo uy tín.
+ Công ty đào tạo tiếng Nhật miễn phí, cơ hội làm việc lâu dài tại Osaka Nhật Bản
+ Và rất nhiều chế độ tốt khác đang chờ đón các bạn.

BHXH + bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe cho nhân viên (F88 Care)
Lương thỏa thuận hấp dẫn + lương KPIs (theo tháng)
description:
1. Nội dung công việc
- Mô hình hóa yêu cầu phân tích theo các công cụ phù hợp (URD, SRS, Usecase, User story, Diagram…) để làm rõ yêu cầu giao tiếp với nghiệp vụ và các BU, từ đó làm rõ yêu cầu/phân tích/tài liệu hóa… và xác nhận với người dùng cuối
- Phân tích về nghiệp vụ, đánh giá khả thi và đưa ra tư vấn về nghiệp vụ, kinh doanh, vận hành một cách tối ưu nhất
- Đưa ra được yêu cầu về phạm vi công việc, đánh giá sơ bộ nguồn lực/ thời gian thực hiện để phản hồi cho đơn vị có căn cứ đưa ra quyết định về việc có thực hiện yêu cầu hay không
- Đề xuất và thiết kế giải pháp phù hợp với yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và tối ưu theo kiến trúc Microservice
- Phối hợp với các bên liên quan (cán bộ phát triển/ cán bộ thiết kế) trong việc quyết định thiết kế các chức năng của giải pháp
- Phối hợp với Giám đốc dự án (PM), Trưởng nhóm phát triển và bộ phận Quản lý chất lượng trong quá trình giám sát và quản lý các hạng mục công việc của dự án bao gồm việc kiểm soát chất lượng và xác nhận kết quả với các bên có liên quan
- Xác định các vấn đề và rủi ro trong quá trình triển khai dự án, hỗ trợ trong các chiến lược giảm thiểu rủi ro và báo cáo lên các cấp quản lý nếu cần

2. Thời gian làm việc: Từ 08h30 - 17h30, từ thứ 2 - thứ 6

3. Địa điểm làm việc: Tòa nhà N01A - 275 Nguyễn Trãi, Thanh Xuân, Hà Nội
requirements:
- Học vấn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học ngành CNTT, Hệ thống thông tin hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan
- Có tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm về BA, đã/đang có kinh nghiệm tham gia triển khai dự án sản phẩm về nhân sự (Điều kiện bắt buộc)
- Am hiểu về lĩnh vực tài chính/ngân hàng, am hiểu về lĩnh vực ngành/nghề đang cung cấp
- Đề cao trách nhiệm trong công việc, ý thức chất lượng sản phẩm tốt; đam mê tìm tòi nghiên cứu học hỏi công nghệ mới, phát triển bản thân
- Ưu tiên ứng viên có thể đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh
- Hiểu biết và mong muốn làm việc trong một môi trường phát triển Agile, chuyên nghiệp

 *** ĐÃI NGỘ
1. Chế độ chính sách
- Lương thỏa thuận hấp dẫn + lương KPIs (theo tháng)
- Thưởng cuối năm + thưởng Lễ/Tết + thưởng sinh nhật + thưởng đột xuất khi hoàn thành tốt nhiệm vụ
- BHXH + bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe cho nhân viên (F88 Care)
- Có cơ hội thăng tiến lên vị trí PO

2. Môi trường làm việc
- Cơ hội làm việc tại Công ty Fintech về dịch vụ tài chính
- Được làm việc trong môi trường trẻ năng động, luôn coi Công nghệ thông tin là yếu tố trọng tâm để phát triển
- Áp dụng mô hình phát triển phần mềm theo Agile, Scrum
- Môi trường làm việc cởi mở và năng động với các giá trị cốt lõi sâu sắc truyền cảm hứng làm việc đến nhân viên
- Khuyến khích trao đổi ý tưởng, đề cao sự sáng tạo trong công việc
- Cơ hội tham gia gắn kết với tập thể thông qua các hoạt động văn hóa sôi động: Teambuilding, Tất niên, 8/3, 20/10, Giáng sinh…

3. Cơ hội phát triển
- F88 cam kết cho bạn nền tảng vững chắc để học hỏi và phát triển
- Tham gia đào tạo bài bản, chuyên nghiệp từ Học viện F88
- Sẵn sàng trao quyền, cơ hội đột phá cho nhân viên
skills: Triển Khai Dự Án, Agile, Phần Mềm Nhân Sự, Phân Tích Nghiệp Vụ, Thiết Kế Giải Pháp

description:
- Trách nhiệm công việc:
1. Chịu trách nhiệm về hoạt động của trò chơi bắn cá tại địa phương
2. Dựa trên phản hồi của người dùng/thị trường/sản phẩm cạnh tranh, v.v., xác định điểm yếu của người dùng và sản phẩm, hình thành nhu cầu và thúc đẩy sự phát triển và chấp nhận nhu cầu việc lặp đi lặp lại
3. Giúp đỡ nghiên cứu tìm hiểu tình hình mới nhất của thị trường địa phương, nghiên cứu nhu cầu của người dùng, theo dõi các sản phẩm cạnh tranh có liên quan và chú ý đến cộng đồng người dùng và các điểm nóng
4. Nghiên cứu các kênh thu hút khách hàng địa phương, khám phá và mở rộng nguồn người dùng chi phí thấp và giá trị cao tại địa phương, xây dựng và thực hiện các chương trình quảng cáo địa phương lập kế hoạch
5. Xây dựng hệ thống duy trì chăm sóc người dùng, đặc biệt là duy trì chăm sóc người dùng cốt lõi.

- Responsibilities:
1. Responsible for the local operation of Fishing games.
2. Based on user feedback/market/competitive products, locate user and product pain points, form requirements, and drive the development, acceptance and iteration of requirements.
3. Help R&D to understand the latest situation of the local market, research user needs, monitor relevant competing products, and pay attention to user communities and hotspots.
4. Researching local customer acquisition channels, exploring and expanding local sources of low-cost and high-value users; developing and executing local promotion plans.
5. Build up user maintenance system, especially the maintenance of core users.

【职位:本地运营/市场运营】
- 岗位职责:
1. 负责捕⻥游戏的本地运营工作
2. 基于用户反馈/市场/竞品等，定位用户和产品痛点，形成需求，并推动需求的开发，验收和迭代
3. 帮助研发了解本地市场最新情况，调研用户需求，监测相关竞品，关注用户社群和热点
4.研究本地获客渠道，发掘和拓展本地低成本和高价值用户的来源;制定和执行本地推广规划
5. 搭建用户维护体系，尤其是核心用户的维护。
requirements:
- Yêu cầu công việc:
1. BẮT BUỘC có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các sản phẩm game, hiểu biết nhất định về sản phẩm, có tích lũy nhất định trong quá trình vận hành
2. Có hiểu biết nhất định về thị trường bản địa Việt Nam và nhóm người dùng;
3. Có tinh thần trách nhiệm và khả năng chủ động phát hiện, suy nghĩ và giải quyết vấn đề;
4. Có năng lực học tập, khả năng giao tiếp và khả năng làm việc nhóm, khả năng chịu áp lực cao
5. Khả năng phân tích dữ liệu cơ bản, nhạy cảm với dữ liệu, có thể hỗ trợ vấn đề định vị sản phẩm

- Requirements:
1. Experience in game products, with knowledge of the product and a certain amount of experience in operations.

description:
Are you passionate about geospatial data and technology? Do you have experience in standardizing geographic data, designing and implementing systems and databases, and developing WEBGIS?

If so, we have an exciting job opportunity for you. Join us in our Water Technology and Resilience team and contribute to the development and management of geospatial data systems. You will have the opportunity to utilize your skills and expertise to make a meaningful impact. Take the next step in your career and let's enhance society together!

What will you do

- Standardize geographic data.
- Design, develop and implement systems and databases for geospatial data.
- Develop WebGIS.
- Perform other duties as needed.

Where you will work

Active in Vietnam since 1985 and established in 1993, HaskoningDHV Vietnam is a 100% foreign invested company of Royal HaskoningDHV and recognized as one of the most prominent leading engineering and consultancy firms with a unique track record of key projects in Vietnam and SE Asia. With offices in Ho Chi Minh City and Hanoi and nearly 200 employees, HaskoningDHV Vietnam has carried out numerous projects for the private and public sector, comprising the full scope of engineering and consultancy services for Industrial projects, Maritime and Waterways, Water Management and Real Estate projects.

What we offer you

We are a professional organization with appealing (inter)national projects and products. You will be working with experts who are leaders across different business lines. We also offer you: 

- Attractive salary and benefits.
- Flexible working conditions to be able to enjoy a good work-life balance.
- Lifelong learning by offering you plenty of training & development opportunities. 
- Excellent opportunities for development in both width and depth.
- Opportunities to be involved in international project.
requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in Surveying and Mapping engineering, Geoinformatics, Computer science, Information 
technology, or a related field required.
- Proficiency with WEBGIS, GIS desktop software and database management
- Good verbal and communication English
- Knowledge of multiple programming languages, satellite image processing is preferred.

Are you our new colleague?

Then we would like to meet you! Apply now by sending in your English CV using the button below.
industry: Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng
skills: GIS, English, Geographic Data, Mapping, Informatic Technology

At DEK Technologies Vietnam, you will live with Agile & Lean principles where employees are empowered at all levels to collaborate cross-functionally, to take pride in collective ownership, to improve yourself by continuously learning, practicing & sharing with others.
requirements:

description:
About WowSuite: As a vanguard in AI-driven software, WowSuite is more than just a workplace; it's where innovation meets passion, and where we empower businesses globally. We believe in a culture of collaboration, growth, and work-life balance.

Our vision is centered around supporting e-commerce businesses with cutting-edge AI and Machine Learning tools, and we need your expertise to continue pushing the boundaries of what's possible in this rapidly evolving industry. If you love software, technology, and eCommerce, you might be the person we're looking for!

Why Consider This Role?

-Propel AI and eCommerce to unseen heights.
-Immerse yourself in a culture of collaboration and continuous learning.
-Competitive remuneration and comprehensive benefits.
-Be the linchpin that fuses tech innovation with strategic enterprise objectives.

The Role: As the Backend Development Lead of WowSuite, your influence will reverberate across every facet of our technical endeavors. Your stewardship will be pivotal in refining the AI-driven heartbeat of our WowSuite platform, encompassing tools like CXWow, PayWow, CTRWow, Wowboost, and FirstContactAI.

Key Responsibilities:

-Strategic Technical Direction: Set the compass for WowSuite's technical vision, ensuring alignment with overarching business aspirations.
-Team Mentorship: Foster a culture of excellence, nurturing our technical teams to surpass even their expectations.
-Platform Integration: Seamlessly weave our solutions into external ecosystems such as Shopify, PayPal, and Amazon.
-AI Innovation: Channel the essence of AI and ML breakthroughs into tangible applications that redefine user experiences.
-Security and Compliance: Implement and oversee robust security frameworks, ensuring that our innovations adhere to global standards.
-Stakeholder Collaboration: Serve as the bridge between technological possibilities and business imperatives, ensuring alignment at every juncture.
-Performance Optimization: Regularly review and optimize the performance of AI applications and backend solutions to ensure they remain efficient and effective.
-Security Oversight: Ensure that all developed applications and integrations adhere to industry-standard security protocols to safeguard user and company data.
requirements:
-Mandatory: 4+ years mastering C#, JavaScript, T-SQL, NoSQL, and MongoDB. Comprehensive knowledge of ASP.NET, Node.js, SOAP, HTTP, WSDL, XSD, and REST. Deep familiarity with data structures and OOP principles. Cloud platforms proficiency.
-Preferred: Proficiency in SPA frameworks, especially React. Experience with Redis, Memcached, and ElasticSearch. Experience with Containerization and Microservices, like Docker, and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.

Location & Flexibility: Our headquarters is in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. This role offers a hybrid working model, allowing a balance of on-site and remote work.

Application Process: Apply now to redefine the eCommerce landscape with us! After your submission, shortlisted candidates will be contacted within two weeks for further discussions.
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: C#, JavaScript, ASP.NET, SQL, REST

description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven eCommerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a collective CAGR of over 400% in just under 3 years. Our mission now is to build DTC brands and increase customer LTV by providing best-valued products backed by no-nonsense customer service policies as Customer Centricity is at the core of our values.

As an integral part of our Technology Innovations CoE, you will work under the supervision of the Engineering Manager and Tech Leaders while receiving guidance from the firm's CTO. Operating within a dynamic Silicon Valley-style Tech-startup environment (Agile mindset), you'll join daily check-ins with the team to stay updated on the project progress and collaborate with the eco-system.

Our aim is to build a comprehensive Cross-border eCommerce Platform that features solutions for Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalogs, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM, and more:
- Develop a Storefront solution
- Centralize payment gateways for managing transactions and after-payment business (such as refunds, chargebacks, claims, inquiries,..)
- Integrate various 3rd services to operate a complete supply-chain system including inventory, catalogs, logistics tracking, and more...
- Convert raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, user behavior, etc. into insights beneficial and significant for business operations.
Plus, numerous other opportunities await your input.


In addition to development tasks, collaboration with other firm’s CoE is crucial to comprehend issues within their specific sectors. Thus, from a technical standpoint, you will propose solutions to help them improve consistently every day.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
- Develop new user-facing features using ReactJS and NextJS
- Translate wireframes and prototypes into high-quality code
- Optimize components for maximum performance across devices and browsers
- Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Collaborate with backend developers to integrate UI and APIs
- Contribute to front-end framework and library development
- Follow industry best practices and standards for web development
- Participate in Requirements Analysis & Technical Specification in the Agile/Scrum development process
requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
- 2-3 years of experience as Front-end Engineer
- Students in Universities or has Bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field
- Strong in logic/math/algorithms or has a passion for Front End technologies
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Experience building web applications using ReactJS
- Understanding of code versioning tools like Git
- Knowledge of UI/UX standards and accessibility best practices
- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical tasks
- Attention to detail, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills
- Good understanding of asynchronous request handling

Preferred (but not required)

- Won prizes in chess competitions / excellent student competitions is a BIG PLUS
- Has knowledge of Clean Architecture, DDD, TDD, SOLID & SOA/Microservices
- Has knowledge of design, and coding principles (e.g.: clean code, DRY/KISS, SOLID)
- Has knowledge of OOP, DI concepts
- .NET Core / Node.js & backend stacks: Postgres, KAFKA, Elasticsearch, S3/Minio
DevOps, SysOps in AWS, and CI/CD experience
- English proficiency

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:

- Competitive salary (up to 26M VND & negotiable depending on what you bring to the table)
- Full salary during probation
- 20 days of work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members
- Guaranteed 13th-month salary
- Quarterly bonus and year-end bonus as part of our profit-sharing program
- A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
- Lots of other company benefits including a 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities, and other monthly/quarterly/annual company events
- General company T&D Program
- Other benefits in accordance with the Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: ReactJS, UI/UX, HTML, JavaScript, CSS

description:
- Biên soạn tài liệu kỹ thuật, vận hành, quy trình, quy định liên quan đến hệ thống bảo mật. Quản lý các tài liệu được phân công thực hiện.
- Quản lý danh mục rủi ro công nghệ thông tin của toàn công ty, đề xuất các giải pháp giảm thiểu, kiểm soát rủi ro phù hợp
- Rà quét lỗ hổng, nhận dạng, đánh giá và thực hiện vá các lỗ hổng trên hệ thống bảo mật. Báo cáo tình trạng hệ thống, các sự cố bảo mật, biểu hiện lỗ hổng bảo mật để đề xuất với lãnh đạo biện pháp khắc phục tức thời.
- Giám sát sự cố, rủi ro an toàn thông tin của công ty, bằng cách giám sát sự kiện bảo mật, xác định, đánh giá, phân tích các điểm bất thường, rà soát các lỗ hổng, nguy cơ của mạng hoặc hoạt động bất thường của hệ thống, báo cáo ngay vi phạm/sự cố.
-Thường xuyên nghiên cứu; cập nhật các giải pháp, công nghệ, bản tin bảo mật mới. Phân tích, đề xuất phòng ngừa, ngăn chặn hoặc cảnh báo kịp thời.
- Thực hiện bảo trì, gia hạn bản quyền phần mềm, bảo hành, vận hành.... cho các thiết bị bảo mật.
- Nghiên cứu tính năng sản phẩm, cập nhật công nghệ mới nhất về các sản phẩm và giải pháp mạng và bảo mật.
requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành CNTT, Bảo mật, An toàn thông tin...
- Tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm về làm chính sách, quy định tuân thủ bảo mật CNTT
- Có kiến thức chắc chắn về các khái niệm bảo mật cơ bản
- Nắm vững kiến trúc tổng thể, và hiểu rõ các cơ chế, thành phần, tiêu chuẩn an ninh… của hệ thống CNTT cho doanh nghiệp nhiều Chi nhánh
- Có kinh nghiệm đánh giá và quản lý rủi ro công nghệ thông tin, rủi ro an toàn thông tin
- Có kiến thức về điều hành Windows, Linux; hệ thống mạng, hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu
- Có kiến thức bảo mật cho các hệ thống đặt tại Cloud (AWS, Amazon, ...)
- Có kiến thức về các giải pháp chống malware, DLP, thu thập Log, mornitor hệ thống bảo mật.
- Có kiến thức về các giải pháp Firewall, IDS, IPS, Ddos

description:
•	Drive product early technical readiness (TR), which require to understand customer requirement and plan for design definition solution.
•	Close handshake with DFx RTL design and Pre-Silicon Validation team to ensure quality of DFx feature implementation.
•	Knowledge and hands-on experience on peripheral protocols such as I/O design protocols (SATA, PCIe, USB and others) is an added advantage.
•	Perform DFx logic design RTL coding and integration into the Chipset SoC
•	Review and fix the DFx logic design to ensure all signal/clock connection, timing and etc. meet the design specifications with zero design errors.
•	Knowledge and hands-on experience on MemoryBIST design is an added advantage.

job: Head of ISO Compliance and Legal
benefits: 13th-month salary and annual performance bonuses
Full coverage of social insurance
Premium healthcare insurance
description:
ISO COMPLIANCE: 60%

- Regulatory Compliance: Overseeing compliance with specific regulations that apply to the BPO industry, such as data protection and privacy laws, ISO9000, ISO27000, labor laws, financial regulations, and any other applicable regulatory frameworks. Monitoring Implement QISMS (ISO9000, ISO 27000) in coordination with executive and mid-level management.
- Policy and Procedure Development: Developing and implementing comprehensive compliance policies, procedures, and controls to ensure adherence to QISMS, GDPR requirements. This includes drafting and reviewing internal policies, codes of conduct, and compliance manuals.
- Risk Assessment and Management: Identifying compliance risks associated with the company's operations, processes. Assessing the potential impact of these risks and developing strategies to mitigate them. 
Internal Investigations: Conducting internal investigations in response to suspected violations of laws, regulations, or company policies. Ensuring thorough and impartial investigations, implementing corrective actions when necessary, and reporting findings to senior management.
- Internal & External Audit Management: Manage external and internal audits, including reviewing materials that require attention for accuracy and properly adhering to stakeholders’ expectations. Conduct periodic compliance audits and assessments to evaluate the effectiveness of the compliance program and make necessary improvements.
- Ethics and Governance: Promoting ethical behavior and ensuring compliance with the company’s governance principles. Providing guidance on ethical dilemmas and fostering a culture of integrity and accountability within the organization.
- Training and Awareness: Conducting training programs and awareness campaigns to educate employees about ISO compliance requirements, promoting a culture of compliance throughout the organization.

LEGAL: 40%

- Legal Compliance: Ensuring the company's compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards. This involves staying updated on legal developments, assessing their impact on the company, and implementing policies and procedures to maintain compliance.
- Legal Advice and Counsel: Providing legal advice and guidance to senior management and other departments within the organization. This includes assessing the legal implications of business decisions, providing guidance on potential risks, and offering legal solutions to support business objectives.
Contract Management: Reviewing and negotiating contracts with clients, vendors, and partners to ensure legal compliance and protect the company's interests. Assessing contractual risks and advising on appropriate risk mitigation strategies.
- External Relationships: Liaising with external legal counsel, regulatory authorities, and industry associations to stay informed about legal and compliance developments, seek guidance when needed, and represent the company's interests in regulatory matters.
- Reporting and Documentation Management: Ensuring timely and accurate reporting to regulatory authorities as required. Maintaining accurate records, documentation, and reporting systems related to legal and compliance matters. Initiating license registrations, and renewal procedures in a timely manner.
requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or related certificates (preferred Admission to Bar)
- Minimum 5+ years-experience related to conducting risk assessment for information systems and/or operations.
- Minimum 3+ years-experience leading industry standard (ISO 9000, ISO27001) audits from either side.
- Strong knowledge of applicable privacy laws (Data protection, GDPR…)
Awareness of IT security and privacy principles, including data governance, cybersecurity, and incident response.
- Experience supporting enterprise-wide Security Compliance programs designed to anticipate, assess, and minimize control gaps and audit findings.
- Demonstrate knowledge of corporate law, commercial law, other relevant laws, and regulations, including country-specific laws.
- Knowledge of software licensing, intellectual property protection, and technology contracts.
- Thorough understanding of vulnerability management, penetration testing, and attack simulations.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to assess risks and develop appropriate strategies.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, to effectively convey complex legal and compliance concepts to non-legal & non-compliance professionals.
- Ability to influence and advise senior management on legal and compliance matters.
- Strong leadership abilities to manage a team and collaborate with stakeholders across different departments.
- Fluency in English
level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

- Quản trị vận hành, phát triển các hệ thống Gateway kết nối với tổ chức chuyển mạch quốc tế NSPK, APN, UPI.
- Hỗ trợ lấy log và kiểm tra log hàng ngày đối với các giao dịch xử lý qua các hệ thống kết nối quốc tế dựa trên yêu cầu của các phòng ban và các ngân hàng, tổ chức thành viên.
- Hỗ trợ các phòng ban kiểm tra, thống kê, báo cáo số liệu các giao dịch chuyển qua hệ thống IST Switch kết nối quốc tế.
- Tham gia các dự án theo sự phân công của cấp có thẩm quyền.
- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của lãnh đạo phòng.
requirements:
- Trình độ học vấn: Tốt nghiệp cao đẳng (hoặc tương đương) trở lên và/hoặc có chứng chỉ nghề trong lĩnh vực công nghệ thông tin, điện tử viễn thông.
- Kinh nghiệm: Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực có liên quan.
- Năng lực chuyên môn: 
+ Có kỹ năng lập trình, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm lập trình với các ngôn ngữ C/C++, Java.
+ Có kỹ năng phân tích thiết kế hệ thống và lập trình, đáp ứng công việc phát triển các hệ thống nghiệp vụ đang hỗ trợ.
+ Ưu tiên ứng viên có kiến thức về tiêu chuẩn thông điệp tài chính ISO 8583.
+ Có hiểu biết chung về Công ty.
+ Có hiểu biết về các quy định, văn bản pháp luật và các kiến thức, kỹ năng chuyên môn nghiệp vụ thuộc lĩnh vực đảm nhiệm. 
+ Có khả năng thực hiện các công việc chuyên môn có tính chất vận hành đảm bảo tuân thủ quy trình/quy định của Công ty phù hợp với quy định của pháp luật.
+ Có khả năng xử lý công việc mới phát sinh ở mức độ vừa phải/chấp nhận được.
+ Có khả năng tự học hỏi nhằm nâng cao năng lực chuyên môn.
- Kỹ năng làm việc: 
+ Có khả năng làm việc bằng Tiếng Anh.
+ Có khả năng sử dụng thành thạo các thiết bị/tiện ích văn phòng để phục vụ công việc.
+ Có khả năng làm việc nhóm. 
+ Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt.
+ Có kỹ năng đàm phán, thuyết phục.
+ Có kỹ năng thuyết trình.
+ Có kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề.
+ Có tư duy logic/tích cực.
+ Có kỹ năng trình bày văn bản rõ ràng, dễ hiểu.
- Thái độ/Hành vi: 
+ Có tư tưởng, phẩm chất đạo đức tốt, lối sống lành mạnh.
+ Tuân thủ các quy định nội bộ của Công ty, quy định của Nhà nước và quy định của ngành ngân hàng có liên quan đến lĩnh vực hoạt động của Công ty.
+ Tác phong làm việc và hành xử chuyên nghiệp. 
+ Tích cực tham gia hoạt động phong trào, tập thể.

CHÍNH SÁCH ĐÃI NGỘ ĐỐI VỚI CÁC VỊ TRÍ TUYỂN DỤNG:
Chính sách đãi ngộ thỏa thuận, thỏa đáng với năng lực và kinh nghiệm của ứng viên tùy theo vị trí công việc đảm nhận.
Chính sách đãi ngộ đảm bảo có tính cạnh tranh trong ngành. Ngoài tiền lương tháng,
ứng viên có cơ hội được hưởng nhiều quyền lợi hấp dẫn khác (hạn mức chi phí tùy theo chức
danh công việc) bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn các quyền lợi sau đây:
- Lương hiệu quả, khen thưởng căn cứ kết quả đánh giá hiệu quả công việc; chương trình phúc lợi cho CBNV;
- Các chi phí được hỗ trợ: công tác phí; chi phí trang phục; chương trình bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện...
- Hỗ trợ ăn trưa;
- Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm;
- Quà tặng nhân dịp sinh nhật cá nhân;
- Được tham gia các hoạt động đoàn thể, teambuilding, và/hoặc chương trình nghỉ mát thường niên của Công ty...
- Được hưởng các chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN và các chế độ khác theo quy định của Công ty phù hợp với Luật Lao động và Luật BHXH hiện hành.
- Được làm việc trong môi trường thân thiện, chuyên nghiệp, năng động, sáng tạo, nhiều cơ hội phát triển.
- Được tiếp cận với các kiến thức mới, chuyên sâu trong lĩnh vực trung gian thanh toán; nhiều cơ hội làm việc với các tổ chức/chuyên gia hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực tài chính ngân hàng, trung gian thanh toán trong và ngoài nước.
-----------------------

description:

This is not limited to service support function to sales team including demo and exhibitions / trade shows.

2.	Customer Services:

-	Actively build and uses a personal network within and outside of company.

description:
The IT Planning Team provides overall Business Management Function covering IT planning, strategy coordination, financial management, IT portfolio management and resources management for the IT and IS departments. This is a central function and the remit extends across IT Change-the-Bank transformation, Business As Usual (BAU) Run-the-Bank and Information Security group that runs Protect-the-Bank initiatives for the region. 
Specific core responsibilities include the following:
A)	Planning & Strategy (30%)
•	Develop the department’s goals and objectives in meeting the bank’s business priorities and missions. 
•	Establish relevant business plan and strategy and drive the plan towards attaining the goals/objectives.
•	Develop and drive the department KPI targets / Balance Scorecard and assess performance against the targets.
•	Prepare, gather, analyse and/or interpret external or internal data so as to develop financial, operation and project reports for management / senior management’s consumption.

B)	IT Program / Project Management (30%)
•	Develop and drive structured IT Portfolio management practice.  
•	Organize, coordinate and track IT programmes, projects and operations and management reporting.
•	Develop and maintain structured management reporting framework

C)	IT Audit/ Regulatory report and examination (30%)
•	Lead and manage IT audit and regulatory examination to conduct fieldwork and determine management response.
•	Prepare and review periodical regulatory examination and report following all the governance of State Bank of Vietnam (SBV) under local regulations.
•      Risk assessment of System as well as Security

D)	Financial Management (10%)
•	Drive the department’s financial, budget and tax management
•	Gatekeep and ensure adherence to prevailing Financial / Taxation / HO policies, guidelines and operating processes.
•	Develop and drive structured oversight of contracts, SLA, vendorship from financial/budgetary and Technology governance standpoint.
•	Develop and drive structured resource management framework for human resources and budgetary sustainability and adequacy.
•	Develop and drive financial management processes or workflow innovation or automation to optimise efficiency.
requirements:
•	University degree or master’s in Computer Science, Manage Information Science, Commerce / Business Administration, Banking and Finance or equivalent
•	English level: Upper intermediate and advanced level who can express themselves fluently, flexibly, and effectively for all purposes.
•	Minimum 10 years of working experience in Mid to Large cap banks
•	Strong experience in planing and coordinating with business and IT teams to establish IT strategy and provide regular tracking/reporting.
•	Strong PMO experience and/or Portfolio Management, program or project coordination from Technology Department.
•	Good knowledge / experience in managing IT financial, budget, and resources.  
•	Good knowledge / experience in cost management and optimisation.  
•	Deep underatanding Vietnam local regulatory reporting, 
•	Deep understanding of  strategic IT planning and compliance check.
•	Basic undertanding of banking systems 
•	Basic understanding of hardware, middleware, Network and cloud based solution.
•	Basic understanding of system security and cyber security.
•	Basic underdstanfing of traditional banking product &  operation as business domain knowledge.
