description:
I.	Key responsibilities and accountabilities  
-	Work with Technical engineers to create drawing of functional gauges and drift gauges.
-	Make calibration plans of functional gauges and drift gauges to make sure they are reviewed and calibrated periodically.
-	Can operate CMM machine to catch up calibration plan.
-	Make the bubble drawing and inspection report for drift gauges and functional gauges.
-	Update bubble drawing and inspection report for dift gauges and functional gauges once drawing changed.
-	Control the quantity and quality measuring and testing equipment in company and make sure their calibration is carried out according to ISO 9001 and API Q1 standards.
-	Make the plan to buy the measure equipment list for each quarterly in the year.
-	In charge of internal calibration for micrometers, calipers, and depth gauges, setting rings and length rods.
-	Maximize usage of calibration software to reduce double entry of data to excel file.
-	Maintain special processes performance such as shot peening Almen strips documentation and laser cladding test coupon.
-	In charge of lab room equipment and complete microstructure and hardness reports.
-	Manage all measurement equipment and make sure all measurement equipement in order and easily to track.
-	Participant NCR meetings and follow corrective actions.
-	Take part in internal audits for QMS and OHSE.
-	Ensuring the strictest and highest confidentiality is adhered all times.
-	Ensuring all compliance and ethical practices are full adhered to.
requirements:
II.	Job Requirement
a.	Background /qualification: 
-	University/ College degree of Technical/ Industrial
b.	Experience: 
-	Minimum 2 years experience calibration measure quipment and control measure equipment.
c.	Special skills:
-	Math skills – data reporting, measuring, calibrating, and calculating specifications.
-	Knowledge about ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 control document, internal audit, external audit.
-	Can read and understand standards of API accreditation.
- 	Have knowledge of mechanical or length calibration.
-	Have a certificate for measuring equipment is preferrable.
-	Have knowledge about GD&T and can read the technical drawings.
-	Can use Solid work software.
-	English communication is an advantage when interviewing. 

III.	What we can offer
-	Competitive salary package and benefits
-	13th month salary bonus 
-	Quarterly bonus
-	Seniority bonus
-	KPI bonus  
-	Allowance on occasion of birthday, public holidays
-	Year-end party, company outing trip
-	Annual health check-up

description:
Job Purpose
The Platform Engineer is a key role responsible for managing the continuous integration and delivery of our platforms, ensuring optimal performance and adherence to best practices. This role requires availability and responsiveness during out-of-office hours and holidays to address and resolve issues promptly.

Responsibilities:
1. DevOps Methodology
• Champion the DevOps methodology and provide guidance to the development team, promoting the adoption of best practices.
• Keep the company updated with modern tools and technologies used in the product development life cycle, such as GitOps, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) principles.
• Define and establish development, testing, release, update, and support processes for efficient DevOps.

2. Design
• Ensure that the architectural design of the platforms aligns with best practices and modern patterns, such as microservices and serverless architectures.
• Review and provide expert recommendations on platform design to incorporate the latest technologies and frameworks.
• Configure and implement cloud-native solutions using AWS, Azure, or GCP, and leverage containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration platforms such as Kubernetes.
• Utilize tools to verify software code security and efficiency, such as static code analysis, vulnerability scanning, and automated testing frameworks.
• Ensure high availability and resilience of the platform against component downtimes through proper architectural design and fault-tolerant strategies.
• Collaborate with the engineering team to design new features and enhance existing ones.
• Design and develop an internal development platform using modern tools like GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, or CircleCI, to facilitate continuous integration and delivery.

3. Delivery
• Configure continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using modern tools and frameworks like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or Azure DevOps.
• Participate in project management activities using Agile methodologies like Scrum or Kanban to ensure seamless development and release of solutions.
• Implement various development, testing, automation tools, and IT infrastructure, leveraging technologies such as Terraform for infrastructure provisioning and Ansible for configuration management.
• Facilitate proper handover and acceptance of solutions, including proper documentation and knowledge sharing.
• Be available during out-of-office hours and holidays to provide support and assistance during scheduled release and ad-hoc release that requires the platform engineers expertise.

4. Automation
• Design and implement an automation framework encompassing all aspects of the application lifecycle, including build, test, and deployment, using tools like Ansible, Chef, or Puppet.
• Utilize Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles to provision and manage infrastructure resources using tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.
• Leverage configuration management tools like Ansible or Puppet to automate the deployment and configuration of software components.

5. Incident and Problem Management
• Serve as a higher-level escalation point for platform-related incidents and problems identified.
• Troubleshoot escalated issues, provide root cause analysis, and implement resolutions.
• Collaborate with the development team to implement improvements identified during routine checks or high severity incidents.
• Be available during out-of-office hours and holidays to provide support and assistance in resolving high severity incidents and anything that greatly impacts the platform delivery.
requirements:
Skills & Qualifications:
• Proficient in working with Linux-based infrastructure.
• Technical expertise in container orchestration concepts such as Kubernetes and related tools (e.g., Helm, Istio).
• Proficiency in databases, message brokers, and caching solutions such as PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Redis, or Kafka.
• Strong project management skills and practical knowledge of Agile Methodology (Scrum, Kanban).

***CERTIFICATIONS
Any of the following is a plus:
• AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate
• AWS Certified DevOps Engineer Professional

Additional Requirements for Senior Level
Any of the following:
• AWS Certified SysOps Admin Associate
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional

Knowledge & Experience:
• Advanced knowledge of systems and networking concepts and fundamentals.
• Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
• Experience in implementing and operating microservices architectures.
• Experience with web services and APIs (REST, GraphQL).
• Familiarity and experience with modern DevOps tools and frameworks such as GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, and monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana.
 Additional Competencies for Senior Level
• 3+ Years of experience in DevOps Concepts, Tools, Processes
• Experience in Project Management, Agile Methodology
• Has at least 1 programming language to implement automation such as Python, PHP, Bash, or PowerShell

description:
The Strategy and Business Intelligence Analyst is a critical role within the CME Solar, focused on leveraging data and insights to fine-tune strategies and drive business development efforts. This role will play a pivotal part in shaping the trajectory of the company by offering analytical support that influences decision-making at the highest levels. 

1. Business Intelligence
• Develop and maintain business intelligence tools, databases, and reporting systems to ensure optimal data storage and retrieval. 
• Leverage data analytics and statistical methods to derive insights and identify business opportunities.
• Monitor industry trends, competitive landscape, and regulatory developments to identify potential impacts and opportunities for the business. 
• Prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management, summarizing findings and providing recommendations.

2. Business Development
• Identify potential partnerships and investment opportunities. 
• Develop and standardize Sales and Business Development process and KPIs.
• Monitor monthly Business Development performance to provide strategic support for different markets (local and international).

3. Strategic Analysis and Planning
• Assist in developing and refining the group's strategic objectives and initiatives based on in-depth market research and analysis. 
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop a cohesive business intelligence framework that aligns with the company's goals and vision.

II. Mô tả công việc
1. Trách nhiệm trong đảm bảo an ninh thông tin:
•	Tham gia các dự án, phát triển, triển khai công nghệ để đảm bảo an ninh thông tin cho các hệ thống sẽ được xây dựng, bao gồm các công đoạn: phân tích, xây dựng yêu cầu ANTT, thiết kế ANTT, threat modeling, rà soát mã nguồn, kiểm thử và xây dựng các biện pháp kiểm soát đảm bảo ANTT cho hệ thống ứng dụng
•	Nghiên cứu, xây dựng các giải pháp ANTT cần thiết để ngăn chặn các cuộc tấn công, sự cố ANTT, đảm bảo an ninh, an toàn cho toàn bộ hệ thống thông tin của ngân hàng
•	Phối hợp với bộ phận giám sát an ninh thông tin tham gia xử lý các sự cố an ninh thông tin
•	Thiết lập và giám sát việc thực hiện quy trình, quy định, tiêu chuẩn, hướng dẫn, chính sách an ninh thông tin của TCB theo quy định của chính phủ và các tổ chức quốc tế
2. Các trách nhiệm khác:
•	Thiết kế và triển khai các chương trình đào tạo nâng cao nhận thức bảo mật, cảnh báo an ninh cho CBNV Ngân hàng

description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

AppSecEngineering:

Vulnerability assessment and penetration testing program and responsible for the design and performance of application security robustness tests :
- Operate a hands-on role involving penetration testing and vulnerability assessment activities of complex applications, operating systems, wired and wireless networks, and mobile applications/devices
- Develop and maintain security testing plans
- Automate penetration and other security testing on networks, systems and applications
- Develop meaningful metrics to reflect the true posture of the environment allowing the organization to make educated decisions based on risk
- Produce actionable, threat-based, reports on security testing results
- Act as a source of direction, training, and guidance for less experienced staff
- Mentor and coach other IT security staff to provide guidance and expertise in their growth
- Consult with application developers, systems administrators, and management to demonstrate security testing results, explain the threat presented by the results, and consult on remediation
- Communicate security issues to a wide variety of internal and external “customers” to include technical teams, executives, risk groups, vendors and regulators
- Deliver the annual penetration testing schedule and conducting awareness campaigns to ensure proper budgeting by business lines for annual tests
- Foster and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and business partners

InfraSecEngineering/ PlatformSecEngineering:

Cybersecurity risk and compliance framework and management:
- Identify, highlight and remediate information security risk in the Bank
Policy, Standards and Processes:
- Comply with the Bank’s Information Security Policy, Regulations, Standards, and Process
- Provide feedback to enhance the current policies, regulations, standards and processes where necessary
- Communicate and ensure all staff understands and comply with the Information Security Policy, Regulations, Standards and Processses
Operations, Reporting and Administration
- Ensure that the Information Security Strategy and Plans are implemented as planned.
- Ensure that Information Security process are followed diligently. This may include Risks Management, Operating Security Services/Tools to support the Information Security Program of the Bank. 
- Control approve the request/changes related to security, control activities of IT security: implementing, operating, vulnerabilities management	
- Contribute to the IT Security Dash Board for Management
- Work with both internal/external audit during audit programs
- Training IT security awareness	
- Collect, analyze and produce report for IT Security every month
requirements:

Experience:

- Have good knowledge about: network security, system security, application security and virus/malwares, secure coding

- Good using some tools for hacking:  VA, APPScan, Metaexploit, kalilinux

Have good knowledge with secure coding with some languages: Python, Shell, PHP and have good knowledge with encryption, cryptography techniques

Allowance for language certification, training course, teambuilding....

description:
• Design and develop Security test plans, test cases, execute test cases (on Web, Mobile, Infrastructure), and report test results to the teams.
• Perform static and dynamic analysis on customer facing applications, websites, and large enterprise networks.
• Provide reports that clearly articulate vulnerabilities and weaknesses to clients.
• Create tools and frameworks with quality code to simplify testing scenarios.
• Conduct malware analysis and provide indicators for defensive measures.
• Coordinate with the threat study teams and offer all necessary functional guidance to avoid any malicious activities.
• Work in partnership with the development teams to deliver business functionality on time with required quality that meets the acceptance criteria.
requirements:
• 3 - 6 years of experience in a technical role in the areas of security operations, threat intelligence, cyber incident response, or penetration testing team; especially STRIDE thread modeling and MITRE AT&T.
• Experience in DevSecOps Services, Threat Modeling, Product Security, Application Security, CSSLP, Red team& Blue team.
• Experience in using the tools for Pentest and Threat Modeling: IriusRisk, ThreatModeler, OWASP Threat Dragon, Burp Suite, Metasploit.
• Understand how industry leaders mitigate security and privacy threats.
• Good at English, ability to communicate and explain methodologies and needs for threat modeling, exposures to internal and external stakeholders.
• Good working knowledge of advanced threat analysis technology in subjects such as banking, telecommunications, computer science, and others are added advantages.
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: Security Testing, Threat Modeling, Pentesting, Cybersecurity Analysis, English

description:
Join as us we embark on a new strategic journey to advance and deliver an innovative operating model. You will lead and devise frameworks, strategies, partnerships and initiatives to shape and enhance our business. 
If this sounds like an opportunity that excites you, and you want to find out more about the organization, please follow the information below: 
1. Strategic Planning and Set up operation in timely and cost-effective manner:
Conduct situational analyses and geographical targeting exercises to help Group BOD make the right decisions in a timely manner.
Set up infrastructure and complete all preliminary works prior operation starts under guidance and support from Head Quarter, including make the effective connection with external partners in all areas:
-	Products: liaise with factories for product development, product registration and compliance
-	Logistics: liaise with 3PLs for fulfilment and last mile services
-	Technology: ecosystem and infrastructure companies for call center.
-	Incorporation legal matters: liaise with consultants, Law firms to set up business in compliance with the Law 
-	Recruitment: support Group HR in related activities
-	Other researches related to local marketing and sales online activities, customers and competitor analysis.
2. Manage all daily business activities and Budget control
Taking responsibility for Sales/ Revenue growth and Profitability and other quality targets (product quality and distribution, customer service satisfaction goals)
Develop/ implement and monitor operational plans within budgets to achieve operational KPIs and business results targets while ensuring alignment and linkage between country team and Regional with regards to process and procedure, policy.
Create initiatives for continuous improvement on all KPIs.
Build rapport with partners and agents in the country, handling all issues so as our business run smoothly every day.
3. Generate Progress Report
Manage local team expectations especially when it comes to necessarily fast changes in operation: Brief the teams about the needs, priorities, KPIs and reasons behind the applied strategy from Group BOD to meet our business goals.
Involved in staff selection, training development, scheduling and ongoing professional development of employees.
Planning capacity and build capability of country teams to contextualize and deliver successfully KPIs targets. Being a good leader that team can rely on and no afraid to get things done

description:
Job Summary
The Head of Product (HoP), reporting to the Chief of Technology, plays a pivotal role in driving customer satisfaction, financial performance, and employee engagement within the Product Teams. Responsibilities include shaping the product vision, managing stakeholders, and serving as the ultimate decision-maker for all product-related matters. This includes monitoring and reporting progress on outcome KPIs, working with technology and business leaders to define hypotheses, run improvement experiments, and analyze data to make decisions on processes and features that influence the direction of customer facing solutions. This role demands a seasoned product leader with strong collaboration skills and a track record of driving innovation. If you‘re ready to lead and innovate in a dynamic environment, we invite you to apply.

Responsibilities
- Day-to-day service levels in the delivery of products to the customer.
- Quality and timely delivery of technology business outcomes (roadmap and KPIs), including customer/stakeholders/employee satisfaction KPIs
- ROI on digital products investment, including creating and executing on the annual digital products business plan
- Digital Products , and customer journey vision, strategies and target outcomes development and communication to all stakeholders
- Healthy pipelines of prioritized work based on highest value, impact to digital product business outcomes and key results, and impact to ongoing delivery of business-as-usual capabilities: enabled by research and discovery capabilities and experiments
- Proper resource levels to deliver outcomes, including operations, business and IT teams, and individuals
- Solution execution that focuses on problems, root causes, and experiments providing incremental solutions are addressing the problems
- Decision making, with decisions made at the lowest practical level, by people closest to the customer, based on data
- Ongoing transparency of key results
- Continuous learning and improvements throughout the digital products teams, including regular Retrospectives and Inspect and Adapt events, the pursuit of rational risks, and a culture of owning failures and mistakes openly
- Digital Product Business culture characterized by empathy for staff, leaders, and partners
- Leverage alignment, transparency, outcome thinking and flow of value concepts through continuous evolution towards enabling end-2-end business agility
- Strategies and target outcomes of the business at the portfolio level
- Strategies and target outcomes of both Digital business and Digital products
- Professional development and performance management of staff within Digital Product Teams.
- Resourcing decisions within Digital Product Teams
- Alignment of key stakeholders with future directions and strategies objective
requirements:
Knowledge and Competencies
- Bachelor’s degree in Science or Business Administration, Economic or equivalent
- Familiarity with scaled agile practices
- Obsessed with the customer, ability to drive value, working backward from the customer
- Excellent manager of staff, retaining their confidence and engagement
- An entrepreneurial spirit and comfort working within a rapidly changing environment and able to take sensible risks and decide to continue or discontinue direction based on data
- Demonstrated experience in strategy development and execution in a customer/stakeholder facing environment
- High degree of business acumen in the fashion sector, in addition to, demonstrated leadership experience, operating in a transform multi location environment with the ability to work with multiple stakeholders
- Demonstrated ability to develop strategies and tactics in collaboration with external(e.g consultants) and internal partners (business units)
- Exposure and experience in such areas as strategy planning, agile, project management principles, lean and system thinking, and change management
- Demonstrated success at senior cross-functional project delivery involving cross-functional teams, stakeholders and business functions
- Exceptional communications judgment and the ability to communicate effectively at all levels with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Confident presentation and facilitation skills and strong interpersonal and leadership skills to facilitate working with senior management at all levels
- Demonstrated ability to build a leading-edge team that new-age thinking
- Strong analytical skills and ability to deliver actionable recommendations based on analysis. Ability to translate analyses to drive comprehensible recommendations
- Superior communications skills (oral, written and presentation)
- Strong analytical skills to quickly analyze external stakeholders requirements, determine key issues, and prepare and implement clearly defined solutions and/or responses

Work location
You can work at one of the following two locations:
- In Hanoi: 90 Nguyen Tuan, Thanh Xuan District, Hanoi City
- In Hai Duong: Head office: An Dinh Street, Viet Hoa Ward, Hai Duong City

Decision Authorities
- Digital products and customer journey vision, roadmap and priorities
- Digital and customer journey level Objectives and Key Results (both creation andacceptance as done)
- Digital products capability allocation to run, extend and innovate

Benefits
- WIN - WIN income/bonus philosophy:
- Year-end bonus: 1-3 months of average income
- Young and dynamic environment, many opportunities for promotion
- Other policies and benefits:
+ 12 days of vacation per year
+ Free lunch at the company, support for travel and business expenses
+ Celebrate birthdays, travel 1 - 3 times/year and other special treatment policies

description:
A. Job Summary
We are seeking a dynamic and visionary Leader of Data Team to spearhead the development and growth of our data products at Yody. In this leadership role, you will lead teams of talented data professionals to harness the power of data and analytics, driving data-driven decision-making and innovation across the organization.

B. Responsibilities
Data Governance
- Oversee the execution of data policies and procedures and report to Executives. 
- Ensure data ownership independence from individuals. 
- Leverage data as an operational enabler for business decisions. 

Data architecture 
- Define, consolidate, and standardize the blueprint for data sourcing to a "single point of truth" across the BU functions. 
- Standardize definitions and classifications of products, customers and other variables, data replication using appropriate models. 
- Confirm Data Reference Architecture (including Big Data)
- Establish Data Modeling process & manage Data Models
- Integrate Data Architecture with Enterprise Architecture 

Data quality 
- Develop standards and systems to manage the source, quality, consistency, usability, security, and availability of data. 
- Consistent business information model.
- Define standards to continually refine data attributes and manage how data is sourced, collected and stored. 
- Profile, map & cleanse critical Data Assets 
- Develop Data Quality rules and reporting tools
- Continuously monitor & improve data quality 

Data Delivery
- Delivery data for reporting needs across the all BU functions.
- Partner with business to create new data and information for analysis. 
- Partner with IT to take advantage of leading technologies 

Data Analytics 
- Support implementation of BI/Advanced Analytics tools 
- Assist in development and support predictive modeling & analytics 
- Leverage Data Visualization techniques to enhance user experience

Data Infrastructure 
- Manage Information Lifecycle of the Corporate Data Assets 
- Manage platform implementation (Cloud, network, OS, DBMS, etc.) 
- Monitor & improve performance of all infrastructure components

Data Security
- Defines the high-level structure of guidelines, regulations and practices in implementation of keeping organizational data compliant.

Innovation
 - Building data sources available supports organizations in identifying new business models and revenue stream
requirements:
C. Qualifications
- Bachelor‘s or Master‘s degree in data science, computer science, or a related field.
- Proven experience in a data leadership role, with a strong track record of developing and delivering data products.
- Expertise in data analytics, machine learning, data engineering, and data visualization.
- Strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.
- Experience with data governance, compliance, and data privacy regulations.
- Experience with building CDP
- Experience with agile product development, system thinking, and design thinking
- Familiarity with fashion industry trends and consumer behavior is a plus
If you are a data-driven visionary with a passion for innovation and leadership, we invite you to join our team and play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our tech fashion company

D. Work location
You can work at one of the following two locations:
- In Hanoi: 90 Nguyen Tuan, Thanh Xuan District, Hanoi City
- In Hai Duong: Head office: An Dinh Street, Viet Hoa Ward, Hai Duong City

E. Benefits
- WIN - WIN income/bonus philosophy:
- Year-end bonus: 1-3 months of average income
- Young and dynamic environment, many opportunities for promotion
- Other policies and benefits:
+ 12 days of vacation per year
+ Free lunch at the company, support for travel and business expenses
+ Celebrate birthdays, travel 1 - 3 times/year and other special treatment policies
skills: Data Center Management, Data Science, Database Structures, Database Architecture, Data Quality

description:
1. Quản lý yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và đặc tả hệ thống CNTT: 
-	Làm việc với các phòng ban, team dự án và các bên liên quan để thu thập, phân tích các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ. Đề xuất, thống nhất phương án khả thi để đáp ứng nhu cầu của dự án, công ty.

-	Tham gia các dự án, phối hợp với các team phát triển sản phẩm đảm bảo sản phẩm được xây dựng, triển khai đáp ứng đúng với yêu cầu kinh doanh, nghiệp vụ và tiêu chuẩn đề ra.

description:
- Leverage aggregated cyber threat intelligence, log, network flow, and anomaly data for analysis, research, and the identification of potential compromise within infrastructure or applications.
- Identify IT security gaps and provide technical and procedural recommendations that will reduce exposure to cyber-risks.
- Research and recommend new methods and applicable technologies to mitigate risk and protect information assets.
- Research new threats, attacks, and vulnerabilities that may affect IT infrastructure, and ways to identify and protect against them.
- Investigate potential cyber-attacks and intrusion attempts.
- Create detailed security incident reports, including root cause analysis and actions to mitigate such risks in the future.
- Support follow-on actions, such as coordinating with other organization teams to facilitate remediation of the alert/event/incident and close out the investigation.
- Support compliance remediation efforts, impact analysis and documentation.
- Maintain SOX ITGCs ensuring controls are designed and operating effectively.
- Provide risk consultation to requests for contractors, evaluations, and questionnaires.
- Promote security education awareness training to all employees.
- Maintain information security policies, procedures, standards.
- Provide support for day-to-day operational tasks associated with management of an enterprise network environment, including securing, and operating all facets of LAN, WAN, and WLAN services.
- Manage projects to include solution design, development of plans, project schedules, and communication of status updates on project milestones.
- Installing, configuring, and supporting network equipment including routers, switches, firewalls, and access points.
- Investigate solutions to provide continual system improvements and optimization.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, analyze, and resolve hardware, software, and other network and performance issues.
- Provide support to remote sites, working with site personnel to identify and resolve network related issues.
- Provide on-site support for site changes when additional resources are required.
- Occasional project-based travel and flexibility to work outside of local business hours.
requirements:
Requirements: 
- Must be a team player with desire to learn.
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT Security, or equivalent experience required.
- 3+ years’ experience supporting information security analysis and multi-site IP-based network environment participating in design, implementation, maintaining and troubleshooting aspects of the network.
- Strong knowledge of cybersecurity frameworks such as ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS, SOX ITGC.
- Strong knowledge of:
- Windows and Linux operating system
- TCP/IP and related Internet and network protocol

- Demonstrate sound troubleshooting methodologies and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Must possess good written and verbal communication skills needed to present to all levels of the organization.
- Ability to work with all levels of staff within and outside of IT and outside the organization.
- Ability to think through problems and visualize solutions.

Interpersonal Skills:
- Must be a team player with desire to learn and grow.
- Ability to communicate with others in a team friendly environment.
- Must display ability to work with a team harmoniously.
- Looking for a long-term team player to join our team.

Desired: 
- Industry security certifications such as CISSP, CISM, GCIH, GCIA, GPEN.

description:
Following research centers in Korea, USA, Russia, India, etc. LG CTO Vietnam Software Lab (LG CTO VSL) officially operated in Vietnam from July 2022 with the mission of developing next generations of technology and incubating new LG business in the future. description:
1. Lãnh đạo sáng kiến chiến lược:
- Xác định, đánh giá và tham mưu lãnh đạo về các sáng kiến chiến lược phù hợp với các mục tiêu chuyển đổi của tổ chức.
- Tiến hành nghiên cứu thị trường, phân tích cạnh tranh và đánh giá xu hướng để xác định các cơ hội kinh doanh tăng trưởng và xu hướng ngành mới nổi, từ đó xây dựng các chiến lược kinh doanh trung dài hạn phù hợp.
- Xây dựng các kịch bản kinh doanh cụ thể và nghiên cứu khả thi cho các sáng kiến chiến lược, bao gồm phân tích tài chính và đánh giá rủi ro.
2. Lập kế hoạch và thực hiện dự án:
- Xây dựng kế hoạch dự án, thời gian biểu và phân bổ nguồn lực, kiểm soát chi phí hiệu quả cho các sáng kiến chiến lược, đảm bảo phù hợp với các mục tiêu chiến lược.
- Thiết lập các chỉ số hiệu suất chính (KPI) và tiêu chí đo lường hiệu quả để theo dõi và đánh giá hiệu quả của các sáng kiến.
- Đề nghị các nhóm nghiệp vụ, cung cấp hướng dẫn, định hướng và hỗ trợ trong suốt vòng đời dự án.
3. Hợp tác với các bên liên quan:
- Phối hợp với các bên liên quan bao gồm các cấp lãnh đạo, trưởng bộ phận và chuyên gia, để đạt được sự ủng hộ và hỗ trợ cho các sáng kiến chiến lược.
- Thúc đẩy các mối quan hệ bền vững và các kênh giao tiếp hiệu quả để thu hút các bên liên quan và đảm bảo sự liên kết và tham gia liên tục.
- Tạo điều kiện hợp tác liên chức năng, thúc đẩy tinh thần đồng đội và phối hợp để đạt được các mục tiêu của dự án chuyển đổi.
4. Quản lý thay đổi và áp dụng:
- Xây dựng các chiến lược và kế hoạch quản lý thay đổi để thúc đẩy việc áp dụng các quy trình, công nghệ và cách thức làm việc mới từ các sáng kiến chiến lược.
- Xác định các rào cản tiềm ẩn đối với sự thay đổi và xây dựng các chiến lược giảm thiểu để đảm bảo thực hiện và áp dụng thành công.
- Cung cấp hướng dẫn và hỗ trợ cho các bộ phận và đơn vị kinh doanh trong quá trình chuyển đổi sang các quy trình hoặc thực hành mới.
- Phân tích dữ liệu và đưa ra khuyến nghị cho các sản phẩm mới và cải tiến cho các sản phẩm hoặc dịch vụ hiện có.
- Đề xuất thay đổi chiến lược kinh doanh dựa trên điều kiện thị trường hiện tại hoặc sở thích của khách hàng. Xác định và theo đuổi thị trường mới cho các sản phẩm hiện có hoặc phát triển các sản phẩm hoặc dịch vụ mới.
5. Theo dõi và báo cáo hiệu suất:
- Xây dựng các cơ chế theo dõi hiệu suất để giám sát tiến độ, tác động và kết quả của các sáng kiến chiến lược.
- Chuẩn bị các báo cáo và cập nhật tiến độ thường xuyên cho quản lý cấp cao và các bên liên quan, nêu bật những thành tựu, thách thức và khuyến nghị.
- Tiến hành đánh giá sau khi triển khai để đánh giá sự thành công và hiệu quả của các sáng kiến chiến lược, rút ra bài học kinh nghiệm cho những cải tiến trong tương lai.
requirements:
- Bằng cử nhân Quản trị kinh doanh, Tài chính hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan (ưu tiên bằng cấp cao).
- Kinh nghiệm đã được chứng minh trong việc lãnh đạo các sáng kiến chiến lược và thúc đẩy sự thay đổi mang tính chuyển đổi trong một tổ chức.
- Tư duy chiến lược và kỹ năng phân tích mạnh mẽ, với khả năng xác định các cơ hội tăng trưởng và đánh giá động lực thị trường.
- Thể hiện chuyên môn quản lý dự án, bao gồm phát triển và thực hiện các kế hoạch dự án, quản lý tài nguyên và thực hiện các mục tiêu.
- Kỹ năng giao tiếp và thuyết trình xuất sắc, với khả năng truyền đạt hiệu quả các khái niệm phức tạp và gây ảnh hưởng đến các bên liên quan ở mọi cấp độ.
- Khả năng quản lý các bên liên quan và xây dựng mối quan hệ mạnh mẽ, thúc đẩy sự hợp tác và đồng thuận giữa các nhóm khác nhau.
- Kinh nghiệm quản lý sự thay đổi, bao gồm thúc đẩy chuyển đổi văn hóa và sự sẵn sàng của tổ chức.
- Khả năng đã được chứng minh để làm việc trong một môi trường có nhịp độ nhanh, quản lý nhiều ưu tiên và mang lại kết quả trong thời gian ngắn.

description:
The position purpose is to help driving overall data strategy & innovation and lead the division in formulating new methodologies in harnessing data to drive business outcomes.
1. Serve as de-facto relationship manager and interfaces (account manager) between data and business units in driving their respective strategic data roadmaps.

• Lead and coordinate strategic project across departments of division related to data platform/data products
• Drive and coordinate the design of curriculum and programs to train and develop the technical and soft skills required of data, cloud and analytics professionals in the division and across the group.
• Develop initiatives, including the coordination of workshops, forums, hackathons to engage group-wide business and support units on the effective use of data and analytics.
• Develop community of data and analytics professionals in the division and across the group, including the coordination of forums, summits and hackathons to build a collective culture of knowledge sharing, camaraderie and innovation.
2. Conduct research and acquire new knowledge for driving data innovation
• Conduct research on modern methods for designing data solutions
• Proactively analyze existing data and identify new data sources to support more impactful analyses
3. Partner business units and other centers/departments on data strategy and innovation
• Working with other centers/departments in EDA as well as Business Units to understand business problems so as to support them in better utilizing data and analytics
• Support other centers/departments in providing guidance on data strategy and innovations
• Training other EDA team members

** BENEFITS:

description:
*** Note: We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCL Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission

Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – buying a home, building a business, or saving for big or small things. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future.    
Be a part of building the ideal data ecosystem from scratch. Ensuring the right data is generated from all applications and sourced at the right velocity with the complete depth and breadth to ensure complete coverage and reuse. This is your opportunity to build new, not fix old.  
This is a people leadership role (up to 5 in a team) with broad responsibilities across many aspects of our data enablement value stream.  
What will your day look like 
•	Define, create, and publish the data architecture standards for all applications and infrastructure across the portfolio
•	Create operational data solutions that will power our new mobile apps (iOS and Android)  
•	Analyze systems that will be used to build brand new Machine Learning models  
•	Operate Marketing Tech systems to provide personalized real-time in-context service and marketing messages to customers that are relevant, useful and sensitive  
•	Enable and lead a team of data engineers to be the most creative and best they can be  
•	Influence our Cloud provider’s product roadmaps to ensure they meet our needs
requirements:
JOB REQUIREMENTS
We are trying to reimagine the way we help and interact with our customers, so we are looking for
candidates with creativity, an open mind and positive energy. Our requirements are as below: 
•	Lead level: At least 8 years of experience in total including at least 4 years of experience with Data Engineering
•	Senior level: At least 4 years of experience in total at a Data Engineer or at a similar role
•	Strong Data Engineer experience in one of following clouds: GCP/ AWS/ Azure (with at least 2 
years working on cloud) 
- As GCP Data Engineer, you must be strong at general Infrastructure and Services and particular 
data services such as Big Query, Dataflow, Airflow, Cloud Function, 
- As AWS Data Engineer, you must be strong at AWS technologies as following: data pipeline (Lake 
Formation, MWAA, EMR, S3, Glue and Athena); data warehousing technologies (AWS Redshift)
- As Azure Data Engineer, you must be strong at Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Databricks and 
Azure Data Factory, Synapse,
•	Proven successful design and implementation of large and complex data solutions (Data Warehouse, Data Lake) using various architectural patterns such as Microservices  
•	Experience with Advanced SQL and Python skills
•	Experience in using DevOps while working Cloud data platforms like using Terraform for 
Infrastructure as Code (IaC), GitOps, using Docker Kubernetes 
•	Good education background of Information Technology (IT) and Information and Communication Technology (ICT)
•	Ability to influence both technical and business peers and stakeholders  
•	Leadership experience of engineering teams, not just their technical skills, but also their careers and ambitions since you are passionate and empathetic  
•	Lead by example – jump on the tools when required to support the team  
•	Good command of English verbal communication
•	If you have work experience with Marketing domains, you will be preferred
You are not expected to have 100% of these skills. At HCLTech, a growth mindset is at the heart of our culture, so if you have most of these things in your toolbox, we would love to hear from you.

WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US

description:
Unique Furniture is an international furniture supplier with headquarters based in Denmark, yet with branches and subsidiaries all over the world. We are experiencing strong growth in multiple markets and looking for candidates who seek a career in the international furniture business.
We are currently looking to recruit a Senior Project Developer for business developing in the Vietnam market.
You will be an integrated part of the Commercial department responsible for business development, developing new products, not only making connections with current vendors but also sourcing new potential vendors. Moreover, you will be responsible for setting up and building the bridge between our customers and our vendors to make sure new products meet customer expectation, follow all standards and regulations of the delivery market, are competitive in the furniture field, in price point and in quality.
Unique is committed to creating a fair and inclusive environment where employees feel safe, proud and valued.
requirements:
The successful candidate will require:
•	At least 5 years’ experience in furniture field and have a good understanding of the furniture industry.
•	To have good understanding about various materials used in furniture industry.
•	To be able to read and understand technical documents related to the furniture industry.
•	To be a person of a strong result orientated character.
•	Excellent communication and negotiation skills as you will directly in contact with overseas colleagues and vendors via email or voice calls.
•	The ability to work collaboratively with internal teams.
•	Proficiency in Microsoft Office software is essential.
•	Strong foreign language skills, at least IELTS 5.0 / TOEIC 600 of English proficiency.
•	Good teamwork abilities, including capability in effective online communication with colleagues and suppliers.

In return we offer:
•	Competitive salary based on experience and skills.
•	Great work life balance.
•	Strong and international learning environment.
•	Strong development opportunities.
If this opportunity has your interest, then do not hesitate to send your application including picture, CV and documentation from University.

description:
Job Summary:

Following research centers in Korea, USA, Russia, India, etc. LG CTO Vietnam Software Lab (LG CTO VSL) officially operated in Vietnam from July 2022 with the mission of developing next generations of technology and incubating new LG business in the future.
You will have the opportunity to work, share and learn with talented engineers at CTO centers in countries around the world and launch strategic-oriented technology products of LG Corporation.
Recently, LG Electronics developed LG Upgradable Platform Appliance and its platform.
Moreover, to expand webOS ecosystem and prepare for the future, we’re developing webOS integrated platform SDK for webOS based product/platform such as TV, signage, OSE and Apollo.
Major components of webOS integrated platform SDK are webOS Studio (IDE), CLI (Command line interface tool) and Emulator. We are looking for developers in Vietnam to build VSL’s SDK scrum and develop webOS SDK.
As a PO, you will:
-	Manage a scrum team (About 10 members) to reach to overall target, assure the quality delivery of product
-	Collaborate with different countries’ lab and report to HQ
As engineers, you will:
-	Create new features based on available resources, fixing bug and test it based on automation test tool
-	Maintain the system
Job details will be discussed in the interview.

description:
1. Quản lý dự án
- Xác định và thực hiện các quy trình quản trị dự án để đảm bảo phù hợp với các mục tiêu chiến lược, quản lý phạm vi và ra quyết định hiệu quả.
- Giám sát quá trình thực hiện, các điều lệ, kế hoạch, lịch trình, ngân sách và phân bổ nguồn lực của dự án.
- Tiến hành xem xét, đánh giá và kiểm tra dự án thường xuyên để đảm bảo tuân thủ các tiêu chuẩn và xác định các lĩnh vực cần cải tiến.
2. Hợp tác và truyền thông đến các bên liên quan:
- Phối hợp với các bên liên quan, bao gồm các cấp lãnh đạo, trưởng bộ phận và nhà bảo trợ dự án, để đảm bảo sự nhất quán và xuyên suốt trong suốt vòng đời dự án.
- Tạo điều kiện giao tiếp hiệu quả và báo cáo cho các bên liên quan về tiến độ dự án, rủi ro, vấn đề nảy sinh và chiến lược giảm thiểu rủi ro.
- Thiết lập văn hóa minh bạch, trách nhiệm giải trình và hợp tác để thúc đẩy các mối quan hệ bền chặt và hỗ trợ các kết quả thành công của dự án.
3. Lập kế hoạch và phân bổ nguồn lực:
- Phối hợp chặt chẽ với các đơn vị kinh doanh, lãnh đạo chức năng và các quản lý dự án để xác định các yêu cầu về nguồn lực và đảm bảo phân bổ phù hợp để thực hiện dự án.
- Tối ưu hóa việc sử dụng tài nguyên trong các dự án, xem xét các bộ kỹ năng, năng lực và sự phụ thuộc để thúc đẩy hiệu quả và đạt được các mục tiêu của dự án.
- Xác định các khoảng trống về nguồn lực và phối hợp với bộ phận nhân sự cũng như quản lý cấp cao để giải quyết các nhu cầu về nhân sự và phát triển tài năng trong nhóm TMO.
4. Công việc cận hành trong Trung tâm TMO:
- Tham mưu và triển khai công cụ, biểu mẫu, phương pháp luận, tiêu chuẩn và quy trình quản trị PMO phù hợp với các thông lệ tốt nhất trong ngành.
- Thúc đẩy văn hóa cải tiến liên tục trong TMO, thường xuyên đánh giá các phương pháp, công cụ và phương pháp quản lý dự án.
- Thúc đẩy chia sẻ kiến thức và áp dụng các thực hành tốt nhất để tối ưu hóa kết quả của dự án.
requirements:

Có nhiều kinh nghiệm trong quản lý chương trình hành động và dự án chuyển đổi
- Kiến thức vững chắc về các phương pháp, công cụ và kỹ thuật quản lý dự án.
- Kỹ năng lãnh đạo và quản lý con người, với khả năng truyền cảm hứng và động viên nhóm.
- Khả năng giao tiếp, đàm phán.
- Tư duy phân tích và khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và đưa ra quyết định sáng suốt.
- Các chứng chỉ liên quan như PMP (Chuyên gia quản lý dự án) hoặc PRINCE2 (Dự án trong môi trường được kiểm soát) là một lợi thế.

- Dự án product nên có cơ hội đề xuất và hiện thực những ý tưởng hay, hợp lý và hiệu quả nhằm hoàn thiện sản phẩm.

= 2 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình PHP (Laravel) hoặc Framework tương tự. 
Biết thêm Java là một lợi thế.
Có kinh nghiệm chuyên sâu trong HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS 3, JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax.
Có hiểu biết chuyên sâu về Apache server, Database MySQL, Linux server, Network, and Security.

Tại sao bạn sẽ yêu thích làm việc tại đây

+ Thưởng theo dự án hàng tháng. Đánh giá lương: 1-2 lần/năm. Bonus tháng 13.
+ Tổng số ngày nghỉ phép hưởng lương hàng năm 17 ngày (bao gồm 5 ngày nghỉ hè: chế độ đặc biệt chỉ có ở RiverCrane).
+ Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe đặc biệt 2,5 ~ 3,5 triệu / nhân viên/năm..
+ Chế độ Hybrid Working Model (HWM) - kết hợp giữa "làm việc từ xa hoặc tại nhà (remote, WFH)" với "làm việc tại văn phòng".
+ Cơ hội được công ty đài thọ toàn phần đi onsite tại Nhật Bản trong 3 tháng.
+ Company Trip hàng năm (2022: Đà Nẵng- Hội An, 2021: tháng 12 Đà Lạt - Thành phố mộng mơ). Câu lạc bộ sport (bóng đá, bóng bàn, bi lắc, game online,...).
+ Được training và tạo cơ hội thực hiện các kỹ năng để trở thành cấp quản lý cấp cao.
+ Chế độ chu cấp kinh phí (300$ ~ 1000$/người) tham gia các lớp nâng cao kiến thức kỹ thuật, softskill tại các trung tâm đạo tạo uy tín.
+ Ngày hội toàn thể nhân viên và gia đình vào tháng 7 hàng năm.
+ Thứ 6 hàng tuần từ 14:30 trở đi là giờ tự nghiên cứu để nâng cao kiến thức.
+ Bảo hiểm bắt buộc được đóng trên lương gross thỏa thuận.
+ Có cơ hội làm việc lâu dài tại Tokyo Nhật Bản.
Và rất nhiều chế độ tốt khác đang chờ đón các bạn !!!

description:
We are seeking a skilled and passionate Android Developer to join our dynamic development team. As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for the Android platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative and user-friendly mobile solutions that meet our clients' needs. The ideal candidate has a strong technical background, a creative mindset, and a passion for mobile application development. 

I. What you will do! 
- Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define project requirements and develop innovative mobile applications for the Android platform. 
- Design and implement efficient, reusable, and reliable code following best practices and coding standards. 
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications to ensure optimal performance and user experience. 
- Continuously research and evaluate new technologies, frameworks, and libraries to enhance the development process and improve application performance. 
- Collaborate with the backend development team to integrate mobile applications with server-side systems. 
- Optimize application performance, responsiveness, and battery usage. 
- Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to coding standards. 
- Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and best practices in mobile application development. 
- Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers when needed. 
- Document the development process, technical specifications, and troubleshooting steps.
requirements:
JOB REQUIREMENTS:
Must have: 
- Bachelor's degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience). 
- Proven experience as an Android Developer at least 5 years, with a strong portfolio of mobile applications developed and deployed on the Google Play Store. 
- Proficient in  Kotlin programming languages. 
- Proficient in MVVM architecture 
- Proficient in Authentication and Security when building mobile banking applications or related applications (e.g.: internal storage, SSL, encryption, …) 
- Proficient in Unit Testing in building mobile applications 
- Solid understanding of the Android SDK, Android Studio, and related development tools. 
- Experience working with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration. 
- Knowledge of the full mobile development life cycle, including design, development, testing, and deployment. 
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and bug tracking tools (e.g., JIRA). 
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. 
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. 
- Self-motivated and eager to learn new technologies and frameworks. 
- Good ability in English  

Preferred Qualifications: 
- Experience with other mobile platforms (iOS, React Native, etc.) is a plus. 
- Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development methodologies. 
- Knowledge of UI/UX principles and best practices for mobile application design. 
- Experience with performance profiling and optimization techniques. 
- Published open-source contributions or personal projects related to mobile application development. 
- Experience in banking domain

BENEFITS: 
- Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus.  
- Insurance based on full base salary 
- Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for Employee and Family 
- 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working 
- 100% salary during probation time 
- Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 49 countries) 
- Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English) 
- Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries

description:

By submitting this application to Home Credit Vietnam Finance Company Limited through Vietnamwork, you agree to allow Home Credit to proceed your provided information in accordance with Personal Data Processing Agreement that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://career.homecredit.vn/vn/article/id/217.


*** IT Information Security Engineer (Governance): 
- Develop and enforce security policies, standards and guidelines to ensure compliance of Information Security with regulations.
- Define IT security requirements and controls in line with the security classification, and internal and external regulations.
- Perform the IT Risk assessment, maintain the IT Risk register and an inventory of controls, implement controls to address identified risk exposure, identify risk response options.
- Identifies and consolidates information assets, maintains Information asset register.
- Perform and report regular check the IT security compliance requirements.
- Initiate, facilitate, and promote activities to foster information security awareness within the organization, create set of trainings for different groups of users to accommodate their needs.
- Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
- Prepare project status reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends.
- Schedule and facilitate meetings related to projects.
- Manage project execution to ensure adherence to schedule, scope.
- Monitor or track project milestones and deliverables.
- Direct or coordinate activities of project personnel.
requirements:
*** IT Information Security Engineer (Governance): 

- At least 03-year experience in IT security areas.
- Knowledge of ISMS/ ISO 27000 and other security best practices (COBIT, NIST, CIS, ...).
- Knowledge of local regulation related to IT and financial business (mainly Circular 09)
- Experience in the area of IT Security, basic knowledge of IT security technologies (SIEM, IDM, MDM, PAM, Vulnerabilities Management, etc.).
- Knowledge in Project Management and Documentation.
- Good skills in external communication (cross-functional teams).
- Ability to manage deadlines and work effectively under pressure.
skills: Security Operation, Security Information, Security Controls, Security Risk Assessment, Security Management

description:
Responsible for ensuring data is made available to understand and guide business performance by:
- Enabling the team to respond to specific business requests for data and/or analysis
- Providing access to new data to enable enhanced understanding (such as models or segmentation)
- Supporting the timely and trusted creation of regular reports and analysis
- Driving data quality (completeness, formats, accuracy, timelines ) across the data team and within the business
- Building and maintaining data governance structures.
- Proactively identifying areas where additional value could be extracted from the data
- Ensuing all analysis undertaken is of high quality through the standardisation and transparency of data (raw and transformed) across the team

Responsible for effectively working with stakeholders (Primarily technology and business)
- Understanding and translating business requirements
- Working with data engineers to enable the effective flow of data across systems
- Design and creation of data structures which enable regular reporting through  data visualization tools 
- Implementation of data controls which liberate the use of data across the business while ensuring appropriate compliance
- Support the automation of reporting wherever possible including automated QC checking 
- Working with data engineers and solution architects in the design of appropriate data structures to support existing and future business needs
- Support in the training and communication of data needs so that there is a high and consistent level of understanding and accurate interpretation of the importance of data across the business.

Supporting the business with respect to the data strategy by:
- Providing guidance on the relative value of data elements and implications of data gaps / quality issues
- Advising on the effective collection, storage and transformation of data to maximise values (improved data quality)
- Adhering to appropriate standards and procedures with regard to data governance and management
requirements:
Minimum requirements
- University degree in IT, Computer Mathematics, Management Information, or related subjects
- Over five years of relevant experience in testing and working with a variety of databases / warehouses / marts / lakes
- Hands on experience with common databases such as MS SQL and Oracle and its associated language SQL, PL/SQL etc 
- Hands on experience with cloud analytics platforms such as Azure, GCP, AWS and Snowflake
- Coding experience in one or more languages such as R, Python, Java etc. 
- Understanding of ETL framework and ETL tools
- Excellent data management skills - the ability to effectively, accurately and without bias; merge, match, sort, transform, trend and summarise data
- Excellent documentation skills
- Strong organisational skills and attention to detail.

Additional
- Ideally experience in securities industry
- Familiar with data visualisation tools such as PowerBI, tableau etc
- Good understanding of the needs of data structures to support AI   
- Communication skills with effective stakeholder management
skills: Data Engineering, Data Architect, Data Modeling, ETL Tool, Python

description:
Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một vị trí vừa thỏa mãn đam mê chuyên môn vừa có mức thu nhập hấp dẫn. Thì còn gì tuyệt vời hơn khi gia nhập Liên doanh ô tô Hyundai tại vị trí Chuyên viên kiểm thử bảo mật (pentest) với mức lương từ 18 -25 triệu trở lên
Bạn sẽ tham gia vào các hoạt động sau:
-	Thực hiện việc rà soát, đánh giá/kiểm thử an ninh thông tin các hệ thống (Web App/Mobile App, System, Network, Cloud, thiết bị IoT, ...)
-	Diễn tập tấn công, phòng thủ, xây dựng các kịch bản giải quyết sự cố an ninh thông tin.
-	Tư vấn bảo mật trong phát triển ứng dụng, thiết kế cơ sở dữ liệu, mạng và các nền tảng hệ thống vận hành.
-	Phối hợp với bộ phận giám sát an ninh thông tin, phân tích đánh giá, phát hiện nguy cơ tấn công, truy cập bất hợp pháp, rò rỉ, lộ loạt thông tin.
requirements:
Chân dung ứng viên Liên doanh ô tô Hyundai đang tìm kiếm:
-	Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học các chuyên ngành về ATTT/CNTT hoặc các ngành liên quan.
-	1 năm kinh nghiệm làm đánh giá, kiểm thử bảo mật
-	Ưu tiên có Chứng chỉ về ANTT như: OSCE, OSCP, GPEN, COMPTIA Pentest+, OSWA, eWPT, eCPPT,... hoặc tương đương.
-	Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ kiểm thử: burpsuite, acunetix, ZAP, Kali linux, metasploit
-	Có kiến thức nền tảng và hiểu biết về các loại tấn công web, tấn công hệ thống máy chủ, Network, Cloud, hạ tầng CNTT.
-	Có hiểu biết về các lỗ hổng bảo mật trong Owasp top 10 web application security, mobile application security.

Ngoài mức lương từ 18 -25 triệu trở lên, còn có các chế độ đãi ngộ hấp dẫn không thể chối từ tại Liên doanh ô tô Hyundai 
-	Thưởng theo kết quả kinh doanh (từ 4 -7 tháng lương)
-	Ăn trưa tại Canteen Công ty (nắng, mưa không lo phải đi ra ngoài nha)
-	Đóng BHXH đầy đủ, thêm cả Bảo hiểm Bảo Việt cho CBNV.
Du lịch/ team building ít nhất 1 lần/ 1 năm (trong hoặc ngoài nước tùy thời điểm)
Khám sức khỏe định kỳ tại các bệnh viện lớn tại Hà Nội
skills: An Ninh Thông Tin, Kiểm Thử Bảo Mật, Security System Management, Web Application Administration, Bảo Mật Dữ Liệu

description:
Koh Young provides a total solution including 3D based Image Reconstruction Inspection. As a product company with over 20 consecutive years of maintaining its absolute number one position in the global market share.
Joining us, you will understand how we can meet almost biggest global companies' demands.

** Your daily works
•	Collaborate with teammates to understand the requirement from customer and design the solution architect for desktop application.
•	Write the code by C# WPF language.
•	Using Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Jenkins systems to follow up and finalize your task.
•	Ensure your solution that meets the specifications, follows standards, is performant and is maintainable 
•	Perform code reviews both as reviewer and reviewee 
•	Provide and plan solutions to adapt with changed request to understand requirements 

** Your continous learning
•	Promote awareness of: Emerging technologies and techniques, Test Driven Development, Object Oriented and SOA design and Use of Design Patterns (IOC, DI, MVVM, MVC)
requirements:
1. Requirements
** Your skills and experience
•	Graduated from University or Post-Graduate in Computer Science, Software Engineering (College is accepted for candidates who good at technical mindset).
•	Interested in Window application programming.
•	If candidates cannot develop, he can be arranged well trained to become IT professional developer.
•	Good understanding of OOP, OOAD, and UML.
•	Having experience in developing and implementing application in real world is one of advantages
•	Experienced in working with 2D or 3D image data. (Image blending).
•	Able to communicate in English. 

** Nice to have
•	Eager to “Learn by Doing”.
•	Experience working with relational DBMS.
•	Experience in designing and building new application architectures
•	Experience in software performance improvement and optimization, multithreading.
•	Able to Korean conversation is an advance.
Please kindly submit your CV in English language

2. Benefits
Plentiful chances to work and study abroad
We have a close cooperation with KY Headquarter, so
•	Both short and long term stay in Korea are always welcome to capture domain knowledge once or twice a year.
•	Frequent opportunities to go business trip to foreign countries, Korea, India, Mexico, SEA,…

** Competitive benefits
•	15 paid leaves per year not including public holidays
•	Attractive remuneration package for you and your family (Special gift for you, for your spouse, and for your children, parents…)
•	And Full Social, Medical & Unemployment Insurance Premium insurance package.
•	Free Korean language class learning.
•	Full paid for Motorbike + car parking.
•	Loyalty program after five years and ten years.
•	Flexible working hours.
•	Monthly with the whole team-building covered by company-funded.
•	Free in-house drinks (coffee, soft drinks,…) and food (cookies, fruit,…).
•	Out-house company-funded sport clubs every Wedneday night (football...)

** Highly professional equipment 
•	Desktop for daily job: CPU Intel Core i7-9700K, 3.6 GHz, 8 core 8 thread, Gigabyte Z390, RAM 64GB, SSD 1TB, GIGABYTE RTX super, two 24 inch monitors).
•	Laptop for business trip: Dell Precision 5570 Workstation  (CPU Intel Core i7, NVIDIA RTX, Display: 15.6-inch Infinity Edge, RAM 32 GB).

description:

•	Manage technical teams, track, feedback, evaluate, and improve performance of subordinates toward their career development path
•	Be responsible for development of subordinates, and strive for their growth through skill building activities, appropriate assignment and daily involvement
•	Be a representative to subordinates for organizational development activities, facilitate in solving the related works concerns, or issues from employees
•	Create and maintain relationships with other teams or departments for a smooth collaboration inside the organization.
requirements:

•	At least 8+ years experience in software development, with proven ability to design, develop, and deliver high quality products

•	Capable in acquisition new technologies, and tech-related concerns for project development
•	Adapt in building team culture, people connectivity and engagement
•	Extensive communication skills for both external and internal to different types of people
•	Excellent problem solving skill, especially in dealing with escalated or critical issue

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

requirements:

description:
Foster Bắc Ninh cần tuyển gấp 01 MIS/IT SENIOR SYSTEM nhằm thực hiện các nhiệm vụ sau:
-	Phân tích các yêu cầu, quy trình và sự cố của hệ thống và người dùng để cải thiện các vấn đề liên quan đến hệ thống máy chủ, hệ thống mạng, quy trình, thủ tục của các bộ phận, phòng ban.
-	Tạo và cập nhật quy trình nội bộ, hướng dẫn sử dụng hệ thống và sơ đồ hóa đáp ứng các tiêu chuẩn ISO của Audit của khách hàng.
-	Quản lý dự án: chuẩn bị kế hoạch dự án và bám sát tiến độ thực hiện. Cung cấp cập nhật trạng thái của các dự án được giao. Đảm bảo giao tiếp dự án có hiệu quả với tất cả các bên liên quan.
-	Liên tục cộng tác với các đồng nghiệp trong nhóm các công ty Foster tại Việt Nam về nước ngoài.
-	Đóng vai trò là điểm leo thang để khắc phục sự cố liên quan đến máy chủ và hệ thống kết nối mạng lõi của Foster.
-	Có sự hiểu biết sâu sắc và chuyên nghiệp trong vấn đề hỗ trợ người dùng cuối (Helpdesk).
-	Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ đột xuất khác do trưởng phòng\ giám đốc CNTT giao phó.

-	Kỹ năng giao tiếp hiệu quả - giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt là một điểm cộng.
-	Chấp nhận các ƯV mới nhà trường có khả năng và mong muốn thử thách với cơ hội mới.

***Các chế độ đãi ngộ:

description:
PURPOSE:
The Product Management (PM) Assistant Manager will be assisting the PM line Manager in addressing the multiple requests for solutions of different channels and partners mapping with their own customer segments.
The incumbent of this role will need to have a consumer-centric mindset, be an independent leader in driving product implementation of initiatives across the organization, be an innovative and creative thinking person, and most importantly have a passion to be different and to “change the way people feel about insurance”.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:
•	Lead the implementation of assigned product initiatives.
•	Represent PM team to lead the implementation team including relevant functional departments (ACT, OP, IT, Legal, Compliance, Finance, Accounting, representatives from channels…), in which:
- Lead the preparation of all product-related documents including Operational Specifications (OP Specs), Product approval report (PAR) for Group submission/approval, also MOF submission/approval documentation such as Terms & Conditions, Sale illustrations, etc. 
- Assist the line manager in addressing all queries/concerns from the regulator, Group and Reinsurers.
•	Join the Product Propositions team to:
- Lead the development of product solutions including features and rules mapping with product propositions.
- Support the development of product communication materials such as training, brochures, and website content.
- Support in conducting Distribution listening sections, Customer research, product training, and workshops.
•	Assist line manager in managing Day-2 items, and propose product offerings for corporate deals to meet channels, partners, and customers’ needs/requirements.
•	Monitor product portfolio & and performance following the company’s strategy. Also, provide the in-forced block insights to drive product initiatives.
•	Other tasks as assigned by the line manager.
requirements:
QUALIFICATIONS / EXPERIENCE
•	University Degree in a business-related discipline. 
•	At least 6 years of working experience, in which 3 years in product development, and product marketing for a financial service industry. 
•	An excellent communicator, both verbally and in writing.
•	Innovative and willing to explore new things. 
•	Able to work well with a wide range of people from different parts of the business. 
•	Energetic and passionate about their product specialty. 
•	Able to work well under pressure.
•	Fluently in speaking and writing English and Vietnamese.

KNOWLEDGE & TECHNICAL SKILLS
•	Good analytical skills – ability to work with numbers, and facts effectively.

description:
Key objectives:

Data Engineering Manager is a leadership role responsible for overseeing the design, development, and management of an organization's data infrastructure and engineering processes. This position plays a critical role in ensuring the efficiency, reliability, and scalability of data systems to support data-driven decision-making and business intelligence initiatives.

Job Responsibilities
Strategy and Planning:
-	Develop and implement a data engineering strategy aligned with the organization's goals and objectives.
-	Collaborate with stakeholders to identify data engineering needs and requirements, and translate them into technical solutions.
-	Stay updated with emerging technologies, trends, and best practices in data engineering and recommend their adoption when appropriate.

Team Leadership and Management:
-	Manage and lead a team of data engineers, providing mentorship, guidance, and support in executing projects and achieving departmental goals.
-	Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture, promoting knowledge sharing and professional development.
-	Define roles, responsibilities, and performance expectations for team members, and conduct regular performance evaluations.

Data Infrastructure Design and Development:
-	Design and architect data infrastructure, including data pipelines, databases, data warehouses, and data lakes, to ensure scalability, performance, and data quality.
-	Oversee the development, deployment, and maintenance of data engineering solutions, ensuring adherence to best practices and data governance policies.
-	Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as data science, analytics, and IT, to integrate data engineering solutions into broader data ecosystems and applications.

Data Integration and ETL Processes:
-	Lead the design and implementation of data integration and ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to acquire, transform, and load data from various sources into target systems.
-	Ensure data integrity, quality, and consistency throughout the data integration process.
-	Optimize data pipelines and ETL workflows to improve efficiency, reliability, and performance.

Data Security and Governance:
-	Establish and enforce data security and privacy measures to protect sensitive data.
-	Define and implement data governance frameworks, including data standards, metadata management, and data lineage.
-	Collaborate with legal and compliance teams to ensure compliance with relevant data regulations and policies.

Collaboration and Communication:
-	Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data science, analytics, IT, and business stakeholders, to understand data requirements and deliver data engineering solutions.
-	Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders, translating complex technical concepts into understandable terms.
-	Provide regular updates on data engineering projects, progress, and challenges to senior leadership.
Other tasks assigned by the Line Manager.
requirements:
-	Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

description:
About the program:
Vietnam is moving toward the industrial 4.0 revolution, which requires an adequate IT digital framework especially for big corporations. As such, the demand for SAP implementation keeps increasing in the Vietnam market. 
TDI APJ - as a leading IT service provider offering complete IT business solutions, business consulting and enterprise solutions - has decided to invest in a fresh graduate recruitment program to fill up the gap.

We are growing our SAP team and have immediate opportunities for entry-level and early professional, forward-thinking candidates with a passion for growth and innovation.
As qualified candidates, you will receive a comprehensive training package for a period of 3 to 6 months, where you will learn both theory and on-the-job mentored by our senior Consultants. After the training, you will be entitled to a variety of choices for career path based on the match with your passion, skills, and abilities.

description:
DUTY & RESPONSIBILITIES
As a Quality Engineering Chapter Lead your mission is to help design and deliver a modern banking 
platform and supporting suite of services that provide simple and secure ways for our customers to 
engage with the bank. You’ll employ your leadership, coaching and engineering skills to help shape 
how teams deliver and test changes effectively with minimal hand-offs and maximum early 
feedback. You’ll view testing as part of the process and not a phase to be managed, and be prepared 
to advocate and influence this point of view. 
What will your day look like: 
• Lead a team of Quality Engineers to design and implement scalable Test Automation practices in 
a diverse technology landscape 
• Create a culture in which teams and individuals take responsibility, help each other to be 
successful and remain a step ahead 
• Take the lead in self-development by staying abreast of industry trends and sharing your 
knowledge with your colleagues
• Coach and mentor other engineers and chapter members 
• Encourage quality engineers to become multi skilled to limit the number of ro les and handovers 
• Make pragmatic design decisions, championing continuous improvement and leading in the 
adoption of agile practice, methodologies and attitudes 
• Work with delivery leads to forecast demand and ensure we have the right people in the right 
places
requirements:
If you are not 100% confident with the requirements below, don’t hesitate to apply because we are also open for engineer's level. 

Must have requirements:  

- At least 8 years of total experience in testing field   

- At least 5 years at Automation test role, from 2 year with Web test Automation, from 2 year with code driven API test automation 

- Experience with at least one programming language (Swift, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, Python, Golang) 

- Experience with Building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines  

- Exposure to REST API testing, contracts and mocking 

- Have a proven track-record in Agile Delivery – preferably within the digital space but putting features in the hands of customers 

- Good interpersonal skill, communication and management skill, prefer candidates having from 3 years at a leader role  

- Strong ability in English, confidently working in an international environment. 


Nice to have:  

- Experience in using test management tools like JIRA, etc. 

- Experience with Performance and Volume testing 

- Experience with Docker 

- GCP foundation level certification or higher, or AWS/Azure equivalent. 

- Relevant experience working in a baking-domain project  

BENEFITS
• Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus. 
• Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for 
Employee and Family
• 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working
• 100% salary during probation time
• Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel 
onsite (in 49 countries)
• Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English)
• Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam 
and foreign countries

company: Công Ty TNHH GMO-Z.com Financial System Vn
benefits: Thu nhập hấp dẫn, lên đến $3000
Hỗ trợ 100% chi phí học tiếng Nhật 1 kèm 1 với giáo viên người Nhật
Cơ hội lớn để sang Nhật làm việc lâu dài trong một tập đoàn về fintech lớn hàng đầu ở Nhật
description:
Công ty TNHH GMO-Z.com Financial System VN là công ty con của tập đoàn GMO Financial Holdings, Inc., một doanh nghiệp hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực công nghệ, tài chính tại Nhật Bản và là một thành viên trong tập đoàn GMO Group. Công ty đang cần tuyển vị trí như sau:

NỘI DUNG CÔNG VIỆC
• Tham gia cùng với các kỹ sư bên Nhật, vận hành và phát triển các product, dịch vụ của công ty.
• Trao đổi với các phòng ban Marketing, Design hoặc PM của dự án để nắm được yêu cầu và triển khai.
• Sang công ty mẹ bên Nhật công tác hoặc sang làm lâu dài khi có yêu cầu từ công ty.
• Review code, hỗ trợ các member khác khi được yêu cầu.
• Tìm tòi, phát kiến ý tưởng, giải pháp cải thiện, cải tiến quy trình, nâng cao hiệu suất công việc và tính năng cho sản phẩm.
requirements:
KỸ NĂNG CẦN THIẾT 
• Tiếng Nhật trình độ tương đương N4 trở lên và có động lực học tiếng Nhật, mong muốn được sang Nhật làm việc lâu dài.
• Có kinh nghiệm phát triển, vận hành ứng dụng iOS/Android
• Có kinh nghiệm phát triển ứng dụng với Kotlin hoặc Swift
• Kinh nghiệm Unit Test/UI test và review code

HOAN NGHÊNH CÁC BẠN CÓ THÊM NHỮNG KHẢ NĂNG SAU:
• Kinh nghiệm lựa chọn kiến trúc và công nghệ kỹ thuật khi phát triển phần mềm
• Kinh nghiệm phát triển SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose
• Kinh nghiệm team leader, quản lý dự án.
• Kinh nghiệm phát triển dịch vụ web.
• Trình bày vấn đề logic, mạch lạc, cầu tiến trong công việc.

QUYỀN LỢI VÀ THU NHẬP: 
• Thu nhập hấp dẫn, lên đến $3000
• Cơ hội lớn để sang Nhật làm việc lâu dài trong tập đoàn fintech lớn hàng đầu ở Nhật.
• Hỗ trợ 100% chi phí học tiếng Nhật 1 kèm 1 với giáo viên người Nhật. Lịch học và số giờ học tự chọn để phù hợp với nhu cầu của bản thân.
• Cơ hội tham gia vào đội ngũ chuyên nghiệp để xây dựng product của chính công ty và làm cùng trực tiếp với các kỹ sư người Nhật.
• Thưởng 50 man yên (tương đương 90 triệu Vnd) khi sang Nhật làm việc lâu dài.
• Hỗ trợ 4000 yên/ngày, hỗ trợ 100% chi phí nhà ở khi sang Nhật công tác.
• Nhận 100% lương trong thời gian thử việc.
• Thưởng cuối năm, nghỉ phép và các chế độ phúc lợi khác theo quy định của nhà nước.

QUY TRÌNH PHỎNG VẤN:
• Phỏng vấn 1-2 vòng 
• Hình thức: Online hoặc trực tiếp 
• Ngôn ngữ: Tiếng Nhật và Tiếng Việt
• Thời gian phản hồi: 1 đến 2 tuần sau khi phỏng vấn.
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: Swift UI, iOS, Android, Kotlin, Leadership
