description:
Job Summary:
Our strategic client - MTech Systems (https://mtechsystems.io/) is looking for a Senior Systems Administrator to join the Information Technology team. At MTech Systems, we are on a mission to revolutionize the protein production industry through cutting-edge software solutions. We are in search of a Senior Systems Administrator who embodies our core values and is driven by the desire to make a tangible impact in the world. The ideal candidate will be a seasoned IT professional with a deep understanding of both on-premises and Azure cloud infrastructure. Your expertise will be instrumental in ensuring the seamless deployment and maintenance of our software, optimizing cloud resources, and leading our team through complex IT initiatives.
As a Senior Systems Administrator, you will be part of the backbone of our IT operations, ensuring that our systems run efficiently and securely. Your role will be pivotal in mentoring junior staff, fostering a culture of collaboration and knowledge-sharing, and staying ahead of the curve by evaluating and implementing emerging technologies. Your contributions will directly influence the success of our global operations, helping producers worldwide gain insights into their farms and optimize production responsibly.
Join us as part of a global team that's passionate about technology, sustainability, and making a difference.
At MTech Systems, you won't just be working on IT projects but contributing to a larger mission that aims to feed the world sustainably. If you're ready to take on this challenge and make a global impact, we'd love to welcome you to our team.

Duties/Responsibilities:
This is an advanced and lead-focused role that requires a high level of expertise in both on-premises and Azure cloud infrastructure. The Senior Systems Administrator will not only work closely with a team of Systems Administrators but will also take the lead on complex initiatives. The core responsibilities of a Senior Systems Administrator include but are not limited to:
• Providing expert-level troubleshooting and problem resolution across a wide range of systems including servers, storage, and network infrastructure.
• Leading the deployment and maintenance of internally developed software in various environments, ensuring stability and security.
• Managing cloud resources and optimizing costs in Azure.
• Mentoring and providing guidance to junior and mid-level administrators; promoting a culture of knowledge-sharing and teamwork.
• Developing and maintaining system documentation, including architecture diagrams, SOPs, and change management logs.
• Planning and executing IT projects, such as infrastructure overhauls, migrations, and upgrades.
• Evaluating new technologies and making recommendations for future implementations.
• Ensuring compliance with all IT policies, procedures, and best practices, and establishing new protocols when necessary.
• Providing remote support and occasional after-hours support for critical issues or deployments.

Application process:
1. CV Screening & Initial Discussion - by ARC Consulting
2. The 1st Interview/Phone Screen by HR – by MTech
3. Assessment sent by HR upon IT Director approval - by MTech
4.The 2nd Interview Manager (45 mins) - by MTech
5. Final Interview with IT Team (1 hr 30 mins) - by MTech
requirements:
Minimum Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• A minimum of 5+ years of experience in Systems Administration, preferably in a high-availability
environment.
• Advanced knowledge of Networking protocols and services (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, etc.).
• Can speak, read, write in English on a proficient/advanced level

Required Skills/Abilities:
• Extensive hands-on experience with Windows Server environments, Hyper-V, and Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP).
• Expert-level knowledge of Active Directory, including complex Group Policy creation, DNS, and DHCP configurations.
• Strong ability to analyze complex problems and devise effective solutions under pressure.
• In-depth experience with cloud computing environments, with a strong focus on Microsoft Azure, including Azure Active Directory and Azure DevOps.
• Scripting capabilities in PowerShell.
• Proficiency with Virtualization technologies and containerization solutions like Docker or Kubernetes.
• Project management skills, capable of leading small cross-functional teams to achieve IT objectives.
• IT certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert, or equivalent are highly desirable.
• Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, able to present complex technical information in a clear and understandable manner to both technical and non-technical audiences.
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: System Administration, Microsoft Azure, Cloud Computing Solution, IT Infrastuctrue, Azure DevOps

2. RESPONSIBILITY/ TRÁCH NHIỆM:
*** Software Test Lead/ Trưởng nhóm kiểm thử phần mềm:
- Làm việc với PM, team dự án để hiểu các mục tiêu dự án, thu thập yêu cầu kiểm thử (manual/ automation), viết test case/ script automation test..
- Cung cấp phương pháp kiểm thử, phát triển chiến lược test, khung kiểm thử, xây dựng công cụ test automation và kịch bản để thực hiện các bài kiểm tra ứng dụng.
- Xác định, phát triển, triển khai và duy trì các kịch bản test.

- Đào tạo và hướng dẫn cho các thành viên trong team. Bao gồm việc tiến hành review code, đào tạo các thành viên trong team test về code mới, phương pháp test, hướng dẫn và cách thức thực hiện tốt nhất.
- Đóng góp vào việc xây dựng môi trường tích hợp liên tục (CI) và các hoạt động cải tiến quy trình liên tục.
- Phân bổ nguồn lực của team test để bám sát timeline release của dự án.

III. Report/ Báo cáo
-	A timely, accurate, and comprehensive report regarding the job-related information to the Board of Directors on a regular or ad-hoc basis/ Báo cáo kịp thời, chính xác và toàn diện về thông tin liên quan đến công việc đến Ban Giám đốc một cách định kỳ hoặc không định kỳ.
requirements:

1. Education background/ Trình độ học vấn:  
- Tốt nghiệp ĐH chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc các ngành liên quan khác (hệ thống thông tin, điện tử viễn thông…)

2. Experience/ Kinh nghiệm:

- Từ 3++ năm kinh nghiệm test mobile/ app

- Hiểu và có khả năng thực hiện các loại test khác nhau như: Smoke testing, Functional Testing, Usability Testing, Security Testing, Performance Testing, API testing, Regression Testing and Compliance Testing
- Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm test ít nhất với 1 ngôn ngữ lập trình như Java, Python…
- Kinh nghiệm làm việc với quy trình và công cụ CI/CD (Jenkins, CircleCI, Github Action hoặc tương đương).
- Ưu tiên có chứng chỉ ISTQB hoặc tương đương
- Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm test trong các dự án lớn, hệ thống AI và Big Data.

V. Benefits/ Quyền lợi
- Đóng góp vào một sản phẩm Việt Nam có thể chinh phục thị trường toàn cầu.
- Cơ hội học hỏi và phát triển, cơ hội đồng hành cùng một Công ty tiềm năng lớn.

- Chăm sóc sức khỏe: Kiểm tra sức khỏe hàng năm.
- Bảo hiểm: Bảo hiểm xã hội.

company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Giải Pháp Công Nghệ Thông Tin Và Hạ Tầng Truyền Dẫn Vinitis
benefits: Thu nhập hấp dẫn, thỏa thuận theo năng lực

Hưởng ưu đãi khi sử dụng các dịch vụ nội bộ trong hệ sinh thái của tập đoàn Vingroup
description:
1.	Công tác kỹ thuật:
•	Tham mưu, triển khai các công tác quản lý, điều hành, khai thác hạ tầng tiếp sóng di động.
•	Phân tích, đánh giá, tổ chức triển khai công tác tối ưu, nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ di động tại các dự án.
•	Thiết kế, quy hoạch hệ thống cơ sở hạ tầng mạng di động outdoor/indoor tại các dự án.
•	Tư vấn, thẩm định thiết kế chi tiết các dự án đầu tư hệ thống tiếp sóng di động tại các dự án của Vingroup.
•	Tổ chức triển khai thử nghiệm giải pháp kỹ thuật mới, các công nghệ mới trong lĩnh vực di động, internet.
•	Thực hiện các công việc liên quan đến tổ chức mời thầu, đánh giá lựa chọn nhà thầu đầu tư, thi công các dự án tiếp sóng di động.

2.	Công tác kinh doanh:
•	Phân tích và lập kế hoạch doanh thu hạ tầng viễn thông hàng năm. 
•	Theo dõi, và xử lý các hợp đồng cho thuê cơ sở hạ tầng kích sóng.
•	Xử lý các nội dung phát sinh đối với các hợp đồng hợp đồng tác với chủ đầu tư dự án.

3.	Công tác khác:
•	Lập kế hoạch ngân sách, kiểm soát chi phí hạ tầng viễn thông.
•	Phụ trách công tác đào tạo, công tác thanh tra chuyên môn hạ tầng viễn thông.
•	Phối hợp các phòng/bộ phận trong khối truyền dẫn triển khai các công việc liên quan.
•	Cập nhật số liệu, kết quả, báo cáo định kỳ.
requirements:
1.	Yêu cầu về Bằng cấp/Chứng chỉ, kinh nghiệm:
•	Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Điện tử viễn thông/CNTT.
•	Có thời gian làm việc ít nhất 05 năm trong công tác quản lý, khai thác mạng di động. 
•	Kinh nghiệm làm việc với chính quyền và các cơ quan quản lý nhà nước về viễn thông là một lợi thế.
•	Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các nhà mạng di động và các nhà cung cấp dịch vụ viễn thông khác là một lợi thế.

2.	Yêu cầu về năng lực chuyên môn:
•	Có kiến thức chuyên môn về mạng di động công nghệ 2G/3G/4G; Hệ thống phủ sóng di động Inbuilding. Hiểu biết về công nghệ di động 5G là một lợi thế.  
•	Có kinh nghiệm trong quy hoạch thiết kế, triển khai dự án, khai thác hạ tầng truyền dẫn quang, hạ tầng vô tuyến di động.
•	Có hiểu biết về mô hình tổ chức quản lý, vận hành, kinh doanh của các nhà mạng di động.
•	Có hiểu biết về hệ thống luật pháp chuyên ngành viễn thông và luật đấu thầu Việt Nam là một lợi thế.

3.	Yêu cầu về ngoại ngữ:
•	Đọc hiểu tốt các tài liệu Tiếng Anh chuyên ngành viễn thông.
•	Có khả năng giao tiếp bằng Tiếng Anh là một lợi thế.

4.	Kỹ năng/Năng lực khác:
•	Tính kỷ luật & chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.
•	Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm.
•	Kỹ năng quản lý thời gian, công việc.
•	Chủ động học hỏi, áp dụng công nghệ giải pháp mới.

skills: Vận Hành Mạng, Hạ Tầng Mạng, Tối Ưu Hệ Thống, An Ninh Mạng, Điện Tử Viễn Thông

job: Business Consultant (ERP Dynamics 365 Financial Operations and AX)
benefits: 13th salary

description:
About our Client:
For almost 20 years, our client has been supporting and guiding small and mid-sized businesses in integrating Microsoft and SAP ERP and BI solutions. The company also sells its own business solutions which exactly match the needs of different kind of industries.

As part of the reinforcement of our customer success teams, we are looking for Business and
Technical consultants to support our customers on issues related to the Microsoft ERP Dynamics 365
Finance and Operations (D365 FO) and AX 2012 (Finance, Supply Chain, Production...).

On a daily basis, you will work with the oversea team including functional and technical consultants, project
managers, to provide the main activities including:
- Providing support and expertise on D365 FO and AX2012 for our customers.
- Working with technical consulting on code maintenance and troubleshooting: Investigating and
fixing bugs by debugging the code in customized D365 FO/ AX projects and Microsoft standard code.
- Analyzing and implementing new features depending on customer requirements.
- Following-up of logged cases and actions carried out.
- Direct communication with customer key users and IT Managers.
requirements:
- At least 2 years’ experience as Support Functional Consultant and have already worked with
Dynamic 365 Finance and Operations (D365 FO) or Dynamics AX2012 / AX2009.
- Good knowledge on ERP D365 FO and/or Dynamics AX2012/2009 on one or more modules (Finance, Supply Chain, Production...)
- Technical Skills in Microsoft D365 FO, X ++, SQL is a BIG PLUS
- Good analysis and communication ability, autonomous, rigorous, pragmatic and customer
oriented
- Good communication in English (written and spoken)
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

description:
CHỊU TRÁCH NHIỆM VẬN HÀNH VÀ TRIỂN KHAI CÁC HỆ THỐNG ANTT CHO TẬP ĐOÀN VÀ CÁC CÔNG TY NỘI BỘ TRÊN NỀN TẢNG CLOUD, BAO GỒM:

*** Vận hành
-	Vận hành và phát triển các hệ thống bảo mật trên một trong các nền tảng Cloud như Azure, AWS hoặc GCP.
-	Phối hợp với đối tác/phòng ban liên quan hỗ trợ vận hành và đánh giá các thay đổi/giải pháp về an toàn bảo mật cho môi trường Hybrid Cloud.
-	Phối hợp các bộ phận, phòng ban liên quan nếu xảy ra các sự cố về an toàn thông tin trong quá trình vận hành và cung cấp dịch vụ Cloud.

*** Tối ưu 
-	Thực hiện việc rà soát, nhằm nhận diện các vấn đề về quản trị và vận hành hệ thống để thực hiện các kế hoạch tối ưu và kiện toàn các hệ thống Security trên nền tảng Cloud.
-	Xây dựng tiêu chuẩn cấu hình áp dụng để kiện toàn hệ thống ANTT trên nền tảng Cloud.

*** Triển khai 
-	Nghiên cứu và triển khai các giải pháp an toàn bảo mật toàn diện cho các lớp Network, Application, Endpoint, Data trên nền tảng Cloud.
-	Đề xuất và xây dựng các giải pháp nâng cao hiện trạng ANTT cho Cloud.
-	Lên kế hoạch và là đầu mối thực hiện triển khai các hệ thống ANTT cho Cloud.
requirements:
BẰNG CẤP/CHỨNG CHỈ, KINH NGHIỆM
-	Tốt nghiệp đại học các nghành: CNTT, ANTT.
-	Có kinh nghiệm triển khai và vận hành Cloud 1 năm.
-	Ưu tiên có các chứng chỉ liên quan đến các hạ tầng Cloud Azure, AWS hoặc GCP.
-	Kiến thức về bảo mật cho nền tảng cloud bao gồm: private, public và hybrid, hiểu rõ về các dịch vụ cung cấp trên nền tảng Cloud.
-	Kiến thức về hệ thống cơ sở hạ tầng đám mây như Azure, AWS, GCP…

KỸ NĂNG
-	Kỹ năng giao tiếp.
-	Kỹ năng quản lý thời gian, công việc.
-	Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm.
-	Tính kỷ luật cao.
-	Chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.
-	Tiếng anh (ưu tiên).

description:
You are a highly motivated, driven leader who thrives in a remote working role in Vietnam with future opportunities to travel to UK to our global HQ. We want people who can take us to the next level with their innovative thinking, problem-solving and passion for success. In return, we’ll invest in you with career development and training. 

ROLE
We are looking for a full stack developer to support our team of .NET developers working on our global ecommerce web sites, portals and administrative tools. 

What you'll be doing:
•	Working on Object Oriented applications providing products and services to both B2B and B2C locally and internationally.
•	The key job role of a full stack developer is to work on both application and web development using front and backend development. Full cycle development end to end, supporting the team of .NET front end and backend developers.
•	Develop software that operates within a highly scalable distributed multi-tiered system. 
•	Participate and influence the technical aspects of our products and technical services.
•	Gain experience working in ecommerce, m-commerce, cloud architecture and train as a senior full stack developer. You’ll gain exposure to our iOS and Android Apps
requirements:
•	Over 4 years’ experience coding in .NET | C# | ASP.NET (Ideally 5+ years)
•	Excellent understanding on iOS Configuration 
•	Experienced in troubleshooting (required)
•	Strong skills in JavaScript with experience with jQuery |Knockout.js |Angular.js |Node.js preferable & AJAX.
•	Good knowledge in CSS 3 & HTML 5
•	Strong working knowledge of SQL Server 2012 DB
•	SQL advanced query structuring and refactoring
•	REST or Web Services experience
•	SAGE Pay / PayPal – Payment Gateway Integration knowledge
•	Key knowledge about IIS (Internet Information Server)
•	HTTPS / SSL and secure site implementations
•	MVC and TDD (Test Driven Development) experience is a MUST
•	Experience in using Agile & Scrum software frameworks
•	UX /UI Principles desirable
•	Knowledge of good coding practices and standards
•	Solid foundation in Object Oriented Programming and Development (i.e. polymorphism, inheritance, inversion of control, etc...)
•	Unit level testing with Jasmine or any related
•	Understanding of high-transaction, online websites
•	Experience with Azure Cloud and Amazon AWS Cloud will be added advantage
•	Experience with Mobile App (Objective-C) and General App will be added advantage
•	E-commerce background preferred
•	Microsoft Certification is Desirable

Languages / Libraries: JavaScript | C# |SQL | .NET | ASP.NET | XML | Augular.js | Node.js | HTML 5
Bootstrap | Ajax | REST | JSON
API’s: Various Web Services 
Cloud: Amazon S3 / EC2 & Microsoft Azure
Frameworks: ASP.Net 4-6, MVC, Ajax, JQuery, HTML and Bootstrap 
DB’s: MS SQL Server 2012
Testing: Jasmine
Tools: Jira, Git and GitHub, Bitbucket, Stack Overflow, Visual Studio Team
Practices: Agile Software Development, Scrum

Other areas of useful knowledge: Apache, OpenStack, Open Source, SQL Server Reporting Services, Network Security, Hadoop & TeamCity

Personal Skills Essential
•	The ability to present complex technical topics to a non-technical audience.
•	Experience and a willingness to work in a fast-paced Agile software development environment.
•	Demonstrates self-motivation, ability to learn quickly and to apply learnings to solutions.
•	Proven track record of being able to solve complex problems independently and to seek out and generate innovative solutions.
•	Bachelor’s degree of higher in Computer Science or Engineering Background – Preferred Self-taught also welcome.

description:
Khách hàng của Navigos Search là đơn vị top 1 thị trường Việt Nam và top 1 Châu Á về cung cấp sản phẩm và giải pháp An toàn thông tin mạng. Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm các ứng viên cho vị trí Back-end Developer tham gia vào những dự án lớn và xử lý các bài toán khó như: Scalable, High-performance, Real-time Processing...

1. Mô tả công việc:
•	Nghiên cứu và phát triển các sản phẩm phần mềm trong lĩnh vực An ninh mạng (thực hiện giám sát và phát hiện tấn công; quản lý ATTT cho tổ chức/doanh nghiệp). 
•	Làm việc với team phát triển phần mềm tiếp nhận, phân tích và tạo ra các thiết kế/kiến trúc mới hướng đến quy mô và hiệu suất. 
•	Thực hiện tối ưu về mặt kiến trúc hiệu năng cho các hệ thống lớn. 
•	Nghiên cứu, áp dụng các công nghệ mới vào phát triển sản phẩm (microservice, cloud native, CI/CD) 
•	Làm việc theo mô hình Agile-Scrum.
requirements:
2. Yêu cầu:
•	Từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình backend. 
•	Có kiến thức sâu về Golang, Python, NodeJS, Java, C# hoặc các ngôn ngữ BE tương đương khác.
•	Có kiến thức về OOP, microservices, Design pattern và thiết kế hệ thống. 
•	Có kinh nghiệm tối ưu hệ thống hoặc tham gia phát triển dự án lớn, số lượng người dùng đáng kể. Biết sử dụng công nghệ Database (SQL, NoSQL), Redis, Message Queue (Kafka, RabbitMQ), các công cụ DevOps (Docker, Docker Compose, K8s) 
•	Có khả năng viết clean & maintainable code, tập trung vào hiệu suất, có thể tái sử dụng và dễ hiểu với kiểm thử đơn vị (unit test). 
•	Có định hướng rõ ràng, sẵn sàng học hỏi những điều mới và yêu thích sản phẩm 
•	Tư duy logic và giải quyết vấn đề tốt, nắm bắt công nghệ nhanh. 
•	Điểm cộng: 
o	Kiến thức, kinh nghiệm lập trình an toàn. 
o	Kiến thức về network, giao thức mạng. 
o	Có khả năng sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ phục vụ triển khai CI/CD. 
o	Đã từng giải quyết một trong các bài toán sau, bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn: tối ưu performance, thiết kế hệ thống lớn, xử lý dữ liệu lớn, thuật toán, scaling, các vấn đề kĩ thuật khó. 
o	Nắm được cơ chế indexing của database, đã từng giải quyết các bài toán phân tích và tối ưu query.

3. Phúc lợi:
•	12 ngày phép hàng năm theo Luật Lao Động và 3 ngày nghỉ mát, nghỉ ngày lễ 22/12

description:
Trusting Social (TrustVision) is the biggest Digital Identity/eKYC service provider for the Banking & Financial sector in Vietnam, with more than 30 existing clients being Banks, Financial Companies, and e-Wallet. TrustVision solutions help clients onboard customers digitally anytime and anywhere, detect fraud, and enable secure transactions with advanced facial recognition and AI models.
As a Senior Product Development Specialist in eKYC Product at Trusting Social, you will participate in decision-making and prioritization to drive product strategy, roadmap, and development, addressing identity trust in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets. You will have the ultimate responsibility for implementing product features that deliver world-class Digital Identity/eKYC. Your role will involve delivering next-generation Digital Identity/eKYC product offerings to our clients and playing a key role in ideating and co-creating new features tailored to Trusting Social's clients and market needs. 

What you will do:
- Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, participate in creating a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually.
- Obsess customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
- Proactively engage in the end-to-end product cycle of research, development, testing, deployment, and improvement.
- Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
- Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience. 
- Collaborate closely with Data Scientists and Product Managers to build a data-informed product roadmap. 
- Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes. 
- Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
- Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation. 
- Manage data collection for product performance tracking and improvement. 
- Support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.
requirements:
- Minimum 2 years of experience in product management along with 5+ years of overall work experience 
- Technical background with a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field 
- Ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, identify key insights, spot product opportunities, and inform product decisions 
- Willingness to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to help your team win 
- Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask, and work well under pressure 
- Good interpersonal skills 
- Teamwork and hardworking with enthusiastic attitudes 
- Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge 
- Capability to zoom in and out on a problem 
- Effective problem-solving skills under pressure

Preferred:  
- Proven track record in Product Management 
- Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products 
- Familiarity with common data analysis toolkits, such as SQL 
- Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics 
- Experience in managing KYC processes or fraud risk management for customer onboarding

description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 400% in just under 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer LTV.

As part of Technology Innovations CoE - supervised by the Engineering Manager & advised by the firm's CTO, you'll also check in with the team daily on the project, collecting information from other products to remain in sync with the entire eco-system in an Agile mindset & strong-Tech Startup environment culture. (Silicon Valley style Tech-startup).

We are creating a comprehensive Cross-border eCommerce Platform that features solutions for Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalogs, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM... Here are some examples:

- Develop a Storefront solution
- Centralize payment gateways for managing transactions and after payment business (such as: refund, chargebacks, claims, inquiry,..)
- Integrate various 3rd services to operate a complete supply-chain system including inventory, catalogs, logistics tracking, and more...
- Convert raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, user behavior, etc. into insights beneficial and significant for business operations.
- Plus, numerous other opportunities await your input.


In addition to development tasks, collaboration with other firm’s CoE is crucial to comprehend issues within their specific sectors. Thus, from a technical standpoint, you will propose solutions to help them improve consistently every day.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
- Participate in Requirements Analysis & Technical Specification in Agile/Scrum development process
- Develop clean, scalable code using .NET Core in Micro-service Architecture & Cloud-native
- Develop backend Data-storage & Data-flows with Postgres, ES, Kafka and various Cloud data toolset
- Test and deploy system (micro-)services & (micro-)apps on AWS EKS/Kubernetes with Docker toolset
- Improve existing system: revising, updating, refactoring and debugging code
- Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC)
- Serve as an expert on the system and provide technical support to other Internal teams
requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
- Bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field
- At least 6 months of development experience
- C#, .NET, .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core, LINQ
- Relational database modeling & design with Postgres
- Knowledge of Microservices, SOLID principles

Preferred (but not required)
- Document DB modeling & design with Elasticsearch
- Message Queues with KAFKA & Message Queue
- Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies
- Knowledge Clean-code, Clean-Architecture
- Having experience in Cloud Native Computing
- DevOps, SysOps in AWS and Git CI/CD experience 
- HTML5/CSS3, JS/Typescript, React.js/Vue.js, Node.js
- English proficiency

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
- Competitive salary (negotiable depending on what you bring to the table)
- Full salary during probation
- 20 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself
- Guaranteed 13th month salary (guaranteed full-month bonus for year 2023)
- Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
- A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
- Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
- General company T&D Program
- Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: .NET, Entity Framework, Micro Services, C#, ASP.NET

description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven eCommerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a collective CAGR of over 400% in just under 3 years. Our mission now is to build DTC brands and increase customer LTV by providing best-valued products backed by no nonsense customer service policies as Customer Centricity is at the core of our values.

At Crossian, we are dedicated to developing a cutting-edge, cross-border eCommerce platform that encompasses a wide range of solutions, including Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalogs, Logistics, Marketing Insights, and CRM. Our platform empowers businesses to:

Create tailored Storefront solutions for unique customer experiences.
Centralize payment gateways to effectively manage transactions and post-payment operations (e.g., refunds, chargebacks, claims, inquiries, etc.).
Seamlessly integrate various third-party services to build a comprehensive supply chain system, incorporating inventory management, catalogs, logistics tracking, and more.
Transform raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, and user behavior into valuable insights that drive strategic business decisions.

We is currently seeking an experienced and highly motivated UX/UI Designer to join our Technology Innovations CoE. In this role, you will collaborate with our Tech team and other cross-functional teams to develop and enhance our product offerings, with a strong emphasis on user-centricity and data-driven decision-making.

As a UX/UI Designer, you will be responsible for understanding user needs, defining design requirements, generating creative concepts, extending visual guidelines, conducting research, prototyping, implementing designs, and iterating based on real data. Your expertise will be crucial in driving innovation and creating exceptional user experiences within our Agile and dynamic Tech Startup environment.

WHAT YOU WILL DO
Deliver valuable, viable, usable, and feasible products, including
- Gather and evaluate requirements from the business team
- Explain user research results to stakeholders
- Analyze your findings and create concepts to cover user needs, desires, or pain points following the design thinking process
- Create user flows to visualize and map out the customer journey, with a focus on mobile commerce experiences, as well as desktop experiences
- Transfer those concepts into usable UI designs (desktop and mobile) deliverables
- Ensure consistency and creativity across consumer touchpoints
- Ability to engage with co-workers, developers, and the business team in a constructive and collaborative way
- Conduct metrics for tracking data and measuring the performance of products, including A/B testing methodologies
- Analyze data results and conduct enhancements based on A/B test outcomes
requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
- Proven 2-3 years of work experience as a product designer or UX/UI Designer, preferably in the eCommerce industry
- A portfolio showcasing your UX/UI/product designs showing your greatest work
- Knowledge of utilizing a Design System, advanced knowledge of Figma
- Strong proficiency in creating designs with a clean and modern UI style
- Understanding of iOS, Android, and website technological capabilities
- Experience in optimizing conversion rates in e-commerce, using persuasive design techniques and understanding user psychology
- Familiarity with user research methodologies and usability testing to gather insights and improve the user experience
- Excellent time management and communication skills
- Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship

ADDED PLUSES
- Previous experience in eCommerce products design
- Certifications in any design or data analysis course
- Knowledge of HTML/CSS
- Knowledge of Motion Design

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:

- Competitive salary (negotiable depending on what you bring to the table)
- Full salary during probation
- 20 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
- Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members
- Guaranteed 13th month salary
- Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
- A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
- Lots of other company benefits including 5* annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events

Tư vấn cho nghiệp vụ, đội ngũ BA/DA về hướng triển khai ứng dụng học máy, học sâu vào hoạt động kinh doanh.

-	Nghiên cứu công cụ, giải pháp, thuật toán nhằm xây dựng mô hình học máy, học sâu trên quy mô dữ liệu lớn với Pyspark, Tensorflow/Pytorch,… ứng dụng triển khai các chương trình kinh doanh, marketing, ứng dụng xây dựng hệ thống khuyến nghị, tích hợp gia tăng hiệu quả app/web…
-	Nghiên cứu thiết kế, cài đặt, tối ưu các thuật toán, công nghệ học máy, học sâu triển khai hiệu quả các bài toán.

description:
Hi there, we’re Article. We’re a North American online furniture company creating remarkably better furniture experiences one sofa at a time. And as the Vendor Quality Specialist, you’ll be the subject matter expert to ensure Article delivers high-quality products to our customers.   

Why We Need You:

Within the Vendor Quality Team, our Vendor Quality Specialist will be conducting quality audits for vendors, developing quality standards, training stakeholders on quality requirements, working on corrective actions, and providing support for escalated issues within a specific product category (case goods, décor, outdoor, upholstery). This fits into our larger need to look for new ways to delight customers with high-quality products and improve the overall users’ experience.

Why Article?

While we sell to the North American market, we work closely with a number of our manufacturing partners throughout Asia. As a result, we have an office in Thao Dien, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam where we currently have around 50 Particles (people of Article) working. 

As a Particle (people of Article), you will have a high level of autonomy to solve challenging, meaningful problems the best way you can. That means you’re trusted to explore solutions you believe will work best (you’re the expert, after all). You’ll do all this while growing your skills within a company that is redefining the furniture industry. 

What You’ll Do:
- Report to Vendor Quality Lead within your dedicated product category to strictly adhere to the determined quality process and improve the product quality performance.
- Conduct factory quality audits (FQA) to evaluate quality management systems and the production capabilities of vendors. 
- Conduct Pre-shipment and Inline inspection for products and products identified with high quality focus. Provide analysis on quality issues and testing failures to identify and implement preventative measures including but not limited to assessing testing standard requirements.
- Supporting Quality Claim Analyst to have technical/quality dialogue with vendors for pending / unresolved claims. Based on product issues or vendor trends, work on projects with relevant stakeholders to continuously improve the product quality (reduce defect rate) through effective implementation of Corrective Action and Preventive Action.
- Participating in establishing internal quality processes, templates, and inspection quality standards.
Administrate the quality records, including the validation and uploading of PSI report, Inline inspection report, FQA report, CAPA reports, etc..
- Develop training materials for in-person, and online training, and update documentation when quality standards or requirements change. Train vendors and internal stakeholders on quality requirements and framework.
- Visit vendors as required to review samples, assess production capabilities and quality systems.
Monitor the quality performance on monthly basic and evaluate quality processes in the field, and identify opportunities for improvement.
requirements:
Who You Are:
- A post-secondary or bachelor’s degree in quality assurance / TQM, electronics, automotive, furniture or a relevant experience
- Excellent written and verbal English Skills 
- 5+ years’ experience in the furniture industry 
- Willing to travel to adjacent countries as required 
- Excellent problem-solving and cross-functional collaboration skills 
- Experience with training, communication and presentation conducted to vendors
- Able to transfer knowledge and train others on technical skills 
- Experience auditing and qualifying vendors 
- High discipline in maintaining QA documentation


Perks & Benefits:
- You’ll start with at least 29 days off between vacation, wellness days, holidays and an Inclusion and Diversity Day
- We offer access to excellent dental and health benefits packages, for your total physical and mental well-being
- State-of-the-art laptops with the tech and tools to easily collaborate while being remote
Be a part of a fast-growing company and an internationally recognized brand as we expand our operations into Vietnam
skills: Furniture, Quality, Vendor Management, Furniture Manufactoring, Vendor Relationship Management

benefits: Premium Insurance
15 Annual Leave
Laptop provided
description:
Reporting to the Data Analytics Manager, as an Analytics Translator, you will:
●	Work together with various business units to understand their operation, gather their analytics needs and data requirements.
●	Help business leaders to identify and prioritize their business problems that analytics is suited to solved.
●	Synthesize the operational expertise of business units and the technical expertise of data professionals (engineers and analysts) to bring impact at scale to the organization.
●	Develop data and analytics solutions to solve the problem in the most efficient and interpretable form for business users.
●	Act as the data Product Owner/Project Manager to lead the key analytics projects.
requirements:
In order to succeed in the role, you should ideally have: 
●	BA/BS in Business, Economics, or a related field.
●	General technical fluency: familiar with data products and solutions available in the market and their applications (e.g. analytics solutions, big data, data structure, GenAI).
●	Excellent business acumen: extensive domain knowledge of your company and your industry. Also, solid analytical, critical-thinking and problem-solving ability. 
●	Strong project management skills: planning, communication, stake-holder management, time and risk management skills.
●	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
●	Prior experience in management consulting, corporate strategy or PMO role is a big plus.


Has this role caught your interest? Reach out to Vietnamworks for more details or follow  www.linkedin.com/company/onpointvn/ for more career opportunities!
skills: Demand Forecasting, Budget Analyst, Business Strategic Planning, Analytics Data, Data Analytics

description:
As a part Bosch group, our responsibility is to develop the Software for Engine Control Unit which is supplying for the world-wide OEM (Europe, Japan, Korea, ...)

We are looking for a skilled Embedded Software Engineer who, along with our excellent software development team, will be responsible for working on projects that are currently being developed on by our company. Duties will include but are not limited to developing and directing software system validation and testing methods, as well as directing our embedded product programming initiatives. You will also be working closely with customers and cross-functional departments to communicate project statuses and proposals.

Therefore, if you like to work in a challenging environment, and qualify the following requirements, we would like to hear from you.

Key Tasks and Responsibilities:
- Analysis of customer SW requirements and queries
- To design and write the embedded software as per the requirements from the customer
- Prepare High Level and Low Level Design
- Preparation of Test Specifications and review
- Perform Unit test / System tests / Delivery test etc
- Integrate new software modules to existing systems and perform integration testing
- Analyzing and fixing of issues reported in the SW components
- Participate in design and code reviews
- Strictly follow the SW development process (ASPICE, SDLC) based on organization recommendations
- Support the SW calibration and testing activities
- Attend regular team meetings to share project status, issues and ideas.
requirements:
Mandatory Skills:
- At least 05 year of experience in Embedded SW Development
- Strong in C/C++ language Programming, has skill in Java is a plus
- Scripting languages (python, Perl, vb …)
- Exposure to Micro-controllers or Microprocessors
- Good English language skills (Reading, Writing, Speaking and Listening)

Desirable Skills:
- Exposure to Real Time Operating System(RTOS)
- Exposure to control systems
- Good Knowledge of automation control (PID control, Adaptive control)
- Exposure to SW version control (Git) and CI-CD system (Jenkins)
- Experience on multi core micro controllers and other hardware components
- Exposure to use of Emulators, Simulators, debugging and Test Equipment
- Good knowledge of ASPICE process standard, AUTOSAR, V-Model, ...
- Automotive system knowledge - ECU, Sensors, Actuator, ...
- Knowledge & experience in CAN Protocol, Diagnosis (KwP, UDS), ISO 14229
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: Embedded, C++, C#, C Language, Automotive

description:
Modern vehicles are increasingly equipped with internet connectivity, which in turn is making vehicle IT systems more vulnerable to attacks. These systems must be protected against unauthorized access by intruders who may attempt to manipulate the ECU software (e.g. tuning) or manipulate the vehicle’s anti-theft mechanism (immobilizer). There is also a risk that criminals could misuse the internet connection of the vehicle to access the in-vehicle communication system and carry out targeted manipulation of the vehicle’s behaviour.

HSM security firmware ensures secure boot of the ECU, secure in-vehicle communication, ECU component protection and secure flashing.

Job nature:
- Develop security firmware for HSM on different platforms: ST SPC58x, Aurix TriCore, RH850,...
- Perform qualification for security firmware.
- Cover full product development lifecycle.
- Apply Scrum framework in software development.
- Have opportunity on-site yearly in Germany.
requirements:
Mandatory requirement:
- Have engineering background (e.g. Computer Science, Control Engineering, Electronics...)
- Career path is technical-oriented
- Experience in Embedded C, with solid knowledge of the language specification
- Familiarity with embedded systems design and low-level hardware interactions
- Strong system thinking and analytical skills

Nice to have:
- Have ability to communicate and collaborate with all team members.
- Willingness to learn and work in a scaled agile environment (SAFe + Scrum)
- Basic knowledge of cryptographic algorithms and protocols is a plus.
- Basic knowledge in automotive domain (AUTOSAR, SHE, ISO26262) is a plus
industry: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
skills: Embedded, C Language, Scrum, AUTOSAR

description:
- Quản trị hệ thống server máy của của công ty:
+ Quản trị hệ thống Domain controler, fileserver, Backup, Restore, Antivirus. Quản trị hệ thống mạng Lan, Wan, load balancing, wifi access poin.	
+ Thiết lập và cài đặt máy chủ, hệ thống mạng nội bộ giữa máy chủ và các máy nhánh trong hệ thống mạng nội bộ.
+ Phân quyền truy cập máy nhánh theo yêu cầu của người có thẩm quyền.
+ Định kỳ cập nhật chương trình diệt virut cho hệ thống máy tính.
- Quản trị hệ thống giám sát, thông tin liên lạc.
+ Quản lý và duy trì hệ thống tổng đài tại văn phòng và nhà máy.
+ Xây dựng và quản lý hệ thống camera giám sát tại văn phòng, nhà máy.
+ Quản lý hệ thống thư điện tử của Công ty.
- Quản lý trang thiết bị tài sản CNTT, sửa chữa, bảo dưỡng trang thiết bị văn phòng trong toàn hệ thống
+ Lên cấu hình thiết bị CNTT theo yêu cầu của các đơn vị.
+ Lập hồ sơ theo dõi kỹ thuật cho toàn bộ máy tính văn phòng. Định kỳ kiểm kê, quản lý danh mục thiết bị CNTT.	
- Hỗ trợ người dùng các vấn đề liên quan đến phần cứng, phần mềm máy tính, máy in, máy chiếu, ERP, Office, ….
+ Cài đặt, cấu hình, máy in, máy tính và các phần mềm liên quan.	
+ Đào tạo, hướng dẫn sử dụng người dùng các thiết bị CNTT, phần mềm phục vụ công việc.	
+ Phối hợp với đồng nghiệp thực hiện các nhiệm vụ chung của phòng.
requirements:
QUYỀN LỢI:
- Tiền lương, đãi ngộ hấp dẫn theo năng lực và khả năng đóng góp của cá nhân (thỏa thuận trong quá trình phỏng vấn)
- Lương tháng 13, thưởng theo kết quả hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh lên đến 2 tháng lương.
- Xét tăng lương, thưởng các ngày lễ lớn trong năm lên tới 1.000.000 đồng/ngày.
- Được tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN và các chế độ khác theo quy định của Công ty và pháp luật Nhà nước.
- Được hỗ trợ, tạo điều kiện để nâng cao năng lực, kiến thức chuyên môn.
- Hỗ trợ ăn trưa lên tới 40.000 đồng/ngày công
- Gói phúc lợi thăm quan, nghỉ mát hàng năm từ 8-10 triệu đồng/năm
- Tham gia các hoạt động, event 20/10, 8/03, sinh nhật công ty,… của Công ty.
YÊU CẦU:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học chính quy, chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin trở lên.
- Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm công tác tại vị trí tương đương.
- Kiến thức
+ Kiến thức về hệ thống thông tin quản lý.
+ Kiến thức về quản trị mạng, quản trị hệ thống server.
+ Có hiểu biết về hệ điều hành windows xp, 7, 8, 10… hệ điều hành mac os.
+ Thành thạo trong việc triển khai các hệ thống camera CCTV.
+ Có khả năng triển khai hệ thống tổng đài analog và VOIP.
- Có trách nhiệm với công việc, làm việc nghiêm túc, nhanh nhẹn, nhiệt tình, khả năng làm việc độc lập cao, sẵn sàng học hỏi tiếp thu các kiến thức, khái niệm mới.

description:
Với mong muốn cùng tôn chỉ của Ateam là mang đến những sản phẩm ổn định và trải nghiệm thân thiện cho người dùng, chúng tôi tìm kiếm đồng nghiệp cho vị trí Mobile Game Developer

* Vai trò và trách nhiệm:
- Phát triển mới, đồng thời bảo trì và vận hành các tính năng Game trên đa nền tảng (Android, iOS ...).
- Đảm bảo chất lượng mã nguồn theo tiêu chuẩn của công ty.
- Không ngừng cập nhật kiến thức, công nghệ mới để đáp ứng nhu cầu công việc.

***Phúc lợi dành cho bạn:
- Thưởng lễ tết
- Làm việc 5 ngày / tuần, nghỉ thứ 7 + chủ nhật + 12 ngày phép năm.
- Có lộ trình phát triển nghề nghiệp rõ ràng.
- Được tham gia BHXH, BHYT đầy đủ.
- Ngoài ra còn có chế độ nghỉ “kỷ niệm ngày cưới, nghỉ sinh nhật gia đình”.
- Du lịch, nghỉ mát, Team Building.
- Được làm việc trong một công ty Game năng động, phát triển. Có nhiều thử thách, có cơ hội được đào tạo và nâng cao nghiệp vụ bản thân.
- Salary: hấp dẫn tùy vào năng lực

*** Ứng viên có thể lựa chọn loại hình làm việc : Remote hoặc Office
requirements:
* Yêu cầu chung:
- Ứng viên sinh sống ở Tp. HCM hoặc nơi gần Tp. HCM để có thể thuận tiện đi đến công ty trong trường hợp cần thiết
- Tính cách thân thiện, có khả năng làm việc nhóm
- Trong công việc không yêu cầu sử dụng ngoại ngữ, nhưng cần gửi CV tiếng Anh.
​
** Senior/Junior:
- Có kinh nghiệm về Game Engine (Unity, Cocos2d-x ...).
- Có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phát triển Game.
- Có tư duy lập trình và tư duy hệ thống tốt.
- Có kiến thức tốt về thuật toán, cấu trúc dữ liệu và lập trình hướng đối tượng.

​
** Fresher:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Công Nghệ Thông Tin.
- Bắt buộc thể hiện điểm GPA trên CVs, yêu cầu tối thiểu: 2.8/4 hoặc 7/10.
​
* Ưu tiên:
- Có sản phẩm đã Release hoặc Demo.
- Có kiến thức toán học ứng dụng cho game 2D và 3D.
- Sử dụng tốt các Design Pattern.
- Có kinh nghiệm tham gia các dự án Client/Server, các dự án Game Multiplayer.
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Native App: Android hoặc iOS.
- Có hiểu biết về lập trình đồ họa (Render Pipeline, Shader ...).

description:
Mô tả công việc:
Về KiotViet:
Sản phẩm công nghệ của Kiotviet được nghiên cứu và sáng tạo tại Việt Nam, bởi kỹ sư phần mềm Việt, dựa vào đóng góp từ hàng trăm nghìn chủ doanh nghiệp, với sứ mệnh mang lại giá trị cho cộng đồng kinh doanh lớn nhỏ trên khắp mọi miền tổ quốc và các quốc gia đang trên đà phát triển hưng thịnh. Kiotviet cam kết đồng hành cùng cộng đồng kinh doanh vừa, nhỏ và siêu nhỏ.
Với 10 năm và hơn 1,500 con người để tạo nên một Kiotviet của ngày hôm nay, chúng tôi hiểu rằng các thành viên, từ quá khứ tới tương lai, là nền tảng cho Kiotviet của ngày hôm nay và bệ phóng để vươn tới một Kiotviet của ngày mai. Kiotviet cam kết một môi trường làm việc chia sẻ thành công, cùng chung trách nhiệm.
Bạn sẽ làm gì:
- Phát triển các dự án phần mềm công ty trên nền tảng Flutter Cross-Platform (Android/iOS)
- Phát triển ứng dụng "KiotViet quản lý nhà hàng"
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác liên quan đảm bảo tiến độ dự án

- Tham gia làm việc cùng các nhà cung cấp giải pháp phần mềm, tham gia triển khai, đánh giá và vận hành các dự án phần mềm của Công ty.

- Hiểu biết về SAP.

description:
Thực hiện phân tích các yêu cầu về sản phẩm, dịch vụ được hiện thực hóa trên kênh Digital Banking
a. Thu thập yêu cầu
    Thu thập yêu cầu từ đối tác, phòng ban nghiệp vụ liên quan như team sản phẩm, team telesales, …
    Mô hình hóa và tổng hợp các yêu cầu.

b. Phân tích
    Các interfaces tương tác khách hàng như mobile app, web app, landing pages, social media…
    Các interfaces hợp tác với các đối tác phục vụ cho khách hàng trong hệ sinh thái chung.
    Các hệ thống quản lý dữ liệu khách hàng, giao dịch và hành vi khách hàng.
    Các interfaces, platform, tools dành cho đội ngũ phục vụ khách hàng nội bộ như Sales Agent App, Web portal, Teller's portal..
    Các hệ thống quản trị dành cho đội ngũ quản lý, vận hành, giám sát, phân tích….
    Các dịch vụ kết nối (micoservices) với các hệ thống trong OCB và ngoài OCB thông qua ESB, API và SDK/APK.
    Các yêu cầu triển khai các sản phẩm, dịch vụ trên nền tảng Omni.
    Thiết kế các giao diện Wireframe.

c. Thực hiện
    Phối hợp team Devs, Designers,... thực hiện các dịch vụ, sản phẩm trên nền tảng Omni.
    Thực hiện các phân tích thay đổi, bổ sung yêu cầu cần thiết trong giai đoạn thực hiện.

d. Triển khai
    Phối hợp Khối Công nghệ, đối tác,… thực hiện triển khai dịch vụ, sản phẩm trên nền tảng Omni.
    Tham gia việc test và kiểm thử trước giai đoạn UAT.

    Am hiểu về ngôn ngữ mô hình hóa UML, BPMN
    Am hiểu về quy trình phân tích nghiệp vụ

    Anh văn trình độ B hoặc tương đương
    Thành thạo tin học Văn phòng. 
    Có trách nhiệm công việc

- Support in the Business-As-Usual activities and ensure that users requirements and requests are delivered timely, accurately and successfully.

- Extensive experience in researching and analyzing market trends and business processes.
- Experience in transaction activities and electronic payments.
- Have participated in related projects at banks or e-commerce and financial technology (fintech) companies.
- Experience in working on multiple projects at one time.
- Experience in writing SQL queries and using data visualization techniques and tools
- Have knowledge about banking products.
- Management and implementation skills.
- In-depth research and analytical skills.
- Problem-solving skills.
- Presentation skills.
- Foreign language skills (English reading comprehension and fluent communication).

*** What do you get?

- Performance Bonus 
- Laptop provided
- Working with world-class talents in a world-class bank

description:
* Principal Responsibilities:
1. Design and operate IT risk and security programs. Provide IT security services that comprise oversight, investigations, strategic vision, and trusted advisory services to IT and Business teams.
2. Develops and manages security (e.g., data, systems, network, and/or Web) across the company. Identifies security risks and exposures, determines the causes of security violations, and suggests procedures to halt future incidents.
3. Provides management with risk assessments and security briefings to advise them of critical issues that may affect customer, corporate security objectives.
4. To direct, manage, plan, and administer the operational and administrative activities associated with the running of ITRS function.

* Functional Responsibilities:
1. To provide recommendations for new or modified policies, standards, and/or guidance documents based on changing technologies, cyber security landscape, and Vietnam’s cyber security regulations;
2. To evaluate, recommend and manage the implementation of security products & services. To perform Risk Assessment of third-party service provider arrangements.
3. To design and support IT security solutions that may be comprised of hardware and software components.
4. To proactively identify security risks and exposures by participating in continuous security reviews, evaluations, and risk assessments.
5. To oversees security awareness programs and provide education on security policies and practices and/or provide training on guidance for compliance with governmental laws and regulations.
6. To manage security testing, reports, and remediations either by internal or external parties.
7. To manage the IT Risk & Security services including but not limited to analysis, action planning, execution, and reporting.
8. To lead and manage IT security incidents. Provide quick guidance and solution for mitigation and remediation minimizing impacts to the business operation as well as reputation.
9. To design, implement, and maintain processes and procedures to ensure the security of data, applications, and infrastructure.
10. Act as the liaison between audit/compliance and IT, reviewing all audit/compliance reports and responses to ensure timeliness and the effectiveness of the corrective actions.

* Supervisory Responsibilities:
1. May provide work guidance to lower-level and project staff.
2. Manage the vendor resources to deliver quality in projects.
requirements:
1. At least four continuous years of either IT security, IT risks, or IT audit role recently.
2. Minimum 2 years of management, supervisory, or team lead experience.
3. Having practical technical skills and experiences in network security, and web application security.
4. Having practical experience in security designs embedding into the system development lifecycle.
5. Having practical experience in IT risks management.
6. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and situation management capabilities.
7. Relevant industry security, risk, and audit certifications such as CISA, CRISC, CISM, and CISSP certifications will be a big plus.
skills: IT Security, Network Security, IT Auditors, Risk Management, CISA

description:
N0. 379
Development aspect for SW  

• Charged with creating embedded control software for automobile electronics

• The creation of communication protocols including SPI, I2C, and UART as well as peripherals like GPIO, Watch Dog, PWM, and ADC.

• Create underlying software modules based on the VECTOR AUTOSAR SIP and DaVinci configuration tool, such as the COM module, DCM & DEM configuration and development, NvM network management, complex driver development, I/O driver development, and I/O hardware abstraction layer configuration.

• Creation of the CAN/LIN and Ethernet communication buses

• Network management and UDS diagnostic development

Test-Switch Aspect:

• In charge of analyzing client testing specifications

• In charge of doing ASPICE-compliant software testing on automotive electronics

• Charged with creating a functional integration testing environment

• Develop functional test plans.

• In charge of creating test case specs, test scripts, and other test-related documentation.

• Understanding of the CAN/LIN bus protocol and associated specs

• Create CAPL and Python test scripts

• Use the VECTOR testing toolchain, which includes CANoe, CANdelaStudio, Diva, vTeststudio, and other tools, to identify and address software testing issues.

• Cooperate closely with the software project team to finish creating the program.

• Reporting to the project manager for software
requirements:
• Excellent camaraderie

• Working knowledge of MCUs from Infineon, NXP, Renesas, and other manufacturers

• Having practical project development experience in diagnostics with CAN/LIN bus is preferred.

• Possess skills in system planning and design, architecture design, verification, embedded software development and testing, code writing, software debugging, code review, and other related areas.

• For expertise developing embedded software code, knowledge of the AutoSAR architecture, ASPICE, and ISO2602 functional safety is preferred.

• Knowledge of static code testing, dynamic testing (unit, module testing), and software integration testing approaches (concepts and tools) is preferred.

• Understand the ASPICE methodology' fundamentals.

• It is required that you speak and listen in fluent English.

• C and C++ programming languages should be written by hand

• Preferable is knowledge of CAN/diagnosis or related testing

• Preferable level of embedded hardware expertise

• Three or more years of relevant work experience in the automotive sector's software testing field

description:
Viet Tin Capital is looking for a talented and passionate UI/UX designer to join our team and work on our innovative product: Maimoney.
Maimoney is a digital wealth management platform that helps provide innovative financial products to activate young Vietnamese investors to start investing.
Viet Tin Capital is also the incubator of two other products/companies: Dcarbon and WOKR. Dcarbon is a blockchain-based platform that enables carbon credit trading and verification. WOKR is a social network that connects freelancers and employers.
As a UI/UX designer for Maimoney, you will be responsible for:
•	Conducting and/or using user research to understand what issues/pain-points users face when they engage with the investment platforms
•	Conducting design experiments, listening to user feedback, and staying on top of industry trends to develop user-centered design solutions
•	Understanding the goals and desired calls-to-action of an organization’s fintech platform and finding ways to meet those goals while still advocating for the user
•	Designing a consistent user experience across mobile devices and desktop platforms
•	Collaborating with product manager, marketers, and engineers to test, iterate, and launch products and services that satisfy stakeholders
requirements:
Requirements:
•	Bachelor’s degree in design, human-computer interaction, or related field
•	At least 2 years of experience in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications
•	Require design portfolio in CV
•	Ability to conduct and make sense of user research using various methods such as interviews, surveys, usability testing, etc.
•	Ability to create engaging and user-friendly interfaces that align with our brand identity and product vision
•	Ability to communicate effectively and present design ideas and solutions to stakeholders
•	Proficient in design tools such as Sketch, Invision Studio, Webflow, Balsamiq, Axure, etc.
•	Knowledge of design principles, best practices, and trends in UI/UX design
•	Portfolio of previous design projects that demonstrate your skills and creativity.

Skills:
•	Wireframing and prototyping
•	Interactive design
•	Visual communication
•	Information architecture
Benefits:
•	Competitive salary and bonus
•	Flexible working hours and location
•	Opportunity to work on a cutting-edge product that has a positive impact on society
•	Opportunity to learn from experienced mentors and colleagues
•	Opportunity to grow your skills and career in a dynamic and supportive environment
skills: UI/UX, Information Architecture, Interactive Design, Visual Communication, Prototyping

- Xây dựng, đánh giá các mô hình cần thiết trong stress test và cung cấp các dữ liệu liên quan đến mô hình rủi ro.
- Thực hiện thu thập, phân tích dữ liệu và phát triển mô hình theo các phương pháp thống kê phù hợp.
- Thực hiện thu thập và chuẩn bị dữ liệu, lên phương án bổ sung dữ liệu nếu cần thiết (mua ngoài, nhập liệu bổ sung…).
- Lên kế hoạch và đề xuất thực hiện, chọn phương án thực hiện mô hình phù hợp (thuê ngoài, tự xây dựng…).
- Kiểm soát và thực hiện theo dõi, báo cáo chất lượng các công cụ đo lường các loại rủi ro.
- Kiểm soát ,thực hiện thẩm định cơ sở, phương pháp, giả định và tính hợp lý của các mô hình, công cụ quản lý rủi ro được phát triển bởi bên thứ ba, khối khác trong OCB.
- Kiểm soát và thực hiện soạn thảo các quy định, quy trình, hướng dẫn cần thiết và triển khai mô hình (chạy thử nghiệm hoặc áp dụng chính thức).
- Kiểm soát và thực hiện việc tổng hợp phân tích và báo cáo trạng thái danh mục tín dụng định kỳ hoặc đột xuất theo yêu cầu liên quan đến mô hình.
- Kiểm soát, xây dựng và hướng dẫn các quy trình quy định liên quan đến công tác của phòng do bộ phận phụ trách.
- Kiểm soát,giám sát dữ liệu cung cấp cho báo cáo CAR(nếu có) và phối hợp thực hiện các công việc có liên quan đến kiểm soát báo cáo tỷ lệ an toàn vốn.
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ liên quan khác theo yêu cầu của cấp quản lý.
requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành Tài chính ngân hàng, Kinh tế, Toán, Xác suất thống kê, Công nghệ thông tin.
- Có ít nhất 03 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc vị trí tương đương, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm xây dựng mô hình hoặc triển khai Basel.
- Có kiến thức về nghiệp vụ ngân hàng, quản trị rủi ro, xác suất thống kê, phân tích dữ liệu.
- Thành thạo tin học văn phòng, các phần mềm xử lý, phân tích dữ liệu(R, Python, SAS, SQL).

description:
About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam, as well as branches and offices.
Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.

Job Responsibilities
•	Manage deposit product features, processes and system setups, etc. to ensure the smooth operation of products
•	Develop and execute product management strategy to drive acquisition and product balances
•	Manage product controls to ensure full compliance to local regulatory requirements and Group policies
•	Perform comprehensive market research to understand product positioning and areas for improvement to gain market share
•	Conduct regular product performance analysis to identify profitable products and customer behaviors
•	Maintain relationship with both internal and external stakeholders to implement campaigns to enhance product benefits
•	Build marketing materials for customer communication and product marketing/promotion schemes
•	Develop business tracking reports across product revenue drivers to achieve business targets
•	Work in a team with shared responsibilities and work within given deadlines
requirements:
Job Requirements
•	Minimum 2 years of experience in retail banking business or similar financial institution role, with focus on deposit product management
•	Fundamental understanding of deposit drivers to identify product growth opportunities
•	Basic understanding of core banking systems
•	Number oriented and familiar with data modeling tools and product analysis 
•	Excellent communication skills to build relationship with stakeholders and partners to execute initiatives and strategies
•	Excellent strategic thinking skills and time/project management to meet tight deadlines
•	Advanced Excel, PowerPoint and presentation skills and familiar with digital and social media marketing concepts 
Education
•	Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Banking/ Economics

Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.

Apply now and make a difference.
https://careers.uobgroup.com/job-invite/115596/
We will review carefully your application and be in touch if your profile is shortlisted.
skills: Banking, Bank Deposits, Banking System, Banking Products

description:
The PMO role at BE GROUP will contributes to improving and optimizing the company's internal processes and general operations. As an important bridge that links and improves internal operations, the role enhances smooth business operations, ensuring the highest efficiency in business operations. By taking direct input from top management, the PMO works closely with various departments and stakeholders to identify areas of improvement and develop and implement strategies and solutions to enhance and optimize internal processes and operations.

- Manage multiple business projects including project planning, project budgeting, resource management, risk management, quality management.
- Define project schedules, allocate resources and monitor progress.
- Work with Business Intelligence and related departments to synthesize data related to the project in charge to perform analysis to resolve and identify cross-functional issues . Make suggestions on solutions and work with relevant departments to deliver business solutions.
- Align with managers on key priorities related to company growth, customer experience programs, and operations improvement.
- Understand the market to propose the best implementation of initiatives.
- Lead the implementation end to end directly and via the coordination and staffing of key stakeholders. 
- Model and measure the success and durability of implementation of programs.
- Coordinate with cross-functional teams, Identify areas for improvement and make recommendations for optimization.
- Present regular progress updates to the CEO and other stakeholders to demonstrate the success, keep the CEO up to date with the project/resources status, issues, or initiatives

description:
Lead Intelligence (LI) is growing! LI is a comprehensive customer acquisition and marketing intelligence platform and we are seeking a talented and experienced senior Java developer to join our agile development team, focusing on new functionality within our existing product/platform using cutting-edge technology while adhering to strict quality standards.

In this role, you will work within a talented and collaborative technical team who are responsible for maintaining and evolving our industry-leading Enterprise SaaS platform and services. Our team takes pride in our technology, technical prowess, and exceptional delivery, enabling us to achieve 100% client retention for over four years and establish ourselves as a reliable and integral partner for our client's strategic success and more specifically, for the purpose of enhancing and improving clients' cross-device lead and customer generation campaigns.
The position presents an exciting opportunity for the right candidate to showcase their development and communication skills and contribute to the business and team's continued success. You will be responsible for developing and rigorously testing dependable code and collaborating with other developers, designers, and stakeholders (including our end clients) to ensure the development of quality web applications, digital projects, campaigns and experiences that meet client and business needs.

You should have a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development and be comfortable working in a global, collaborative environment. Everyone at Lead Intelligence is valued, and you will have an opportunity to help shape the vision for our software solutions.


The Role

- Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for both front-end and back-end components.
- Conduct testing and debugging to ensure the application is functioning correctly and efficiently.
- Contribute to the optimisation of projects and campaign initiatives by assisting LI licence holders and internal stakeholders (clients) from initial setup through execution and beyond.
- Effectively driving technical conversations, aligning development with formal SDLCs like Kanban and Agile, and consistently producing and testing reliable code.
- A role that requires written and verbal communication to internal and external stakeholders.
- Offer technical and support expertise to identify operational or platform issues and contribute to their resolution. Additionally, validate delivered functionality against established specifications or requirements.
- As a senior developers and solutions specialist,  collaborate and provide important technical guidance and support to other technical account managers and other internal and external stakeholders. Our technical account managers and our clients might need help troubleshooting and resolve issues with daily tasks such as integrating third-party data into our platform to enhance marketing optimisation and analysis capabilities, working with client and design teams to develop and build advanced marketing funnel and campaign assets such as responsive microsites, custom forms, emails and tailored on-site messaging, connecting and integrating external CRM, data and ad platforms, advise and set validation controls, test tracking, integrating with third-party APIs and build clear and insightful reports and dashboards. Furthermore, the development team is constantly seeking to uncover technical and operational strategies that elevate the LI platform's functionalities.
- Actively seek new technological and marketing/ad platform trends and contribute to the team by suggesting innovative ideas.
- Work effectively under pressure and against deadlines at times.
- Strive to provide additional value beyond the designated role by proactively cultivating a collaborative team environment, fostering cooperation among colleagues, generating informative case studies and guides, and continuously seeking opportunities to refine the engineering team's processes and standards.
requirements:
- You should have a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development and be comfortable working in a global, collaborative environment. 
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
- Proven experience of at least 7 years as a Full-Stack Developer or similar role. Strong experience and knowledge of Java, with a focus on Java Enterprise Edition (JJE) and Java Standard Edition (JSE) , - JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, Open Source libraries, API protocols and also an advantage of knowledge &/or experience of other tools/processes like AWS cloud architecture, OOP and software design skills, Photoshop and Google Tag Manager.
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
- Familiarity with DevOps practices, including containerization and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD). Also, experience with Git version control system.
- An adept internet technologist who is deeply enthusiastic about web technology and software development. A proficient expert with a comprehensive grasp of digital advertising and marketing and  its associated technologies.
- Skilled at communicating with individuals of varying technical backgrounds, while also being a confident provider of technical support and advice.
- Superb organisational and time management skills - exhibits a self-motivated and proactive work approach.
- Enthusiastic troubleshooter and constructive team collaborator.
- Advantageous if have experience with cloud-based marketing and advertising platforms, such as, Google Ads, Meta Ads, Outbrain, Taboola, DevOps &/or campaign operations experience, advanced Excel, coding skills, advertising platforms & advertisement tracking tags, and data and analytics experience.
- Advanced quantitative analysis, solid business acumen and problem-solving.
- Positive, committed team member with a challenger mentality and strong personal ambitions.
- Detail-oriented and deadline-driven, we take pride in delivering quality work.

description:
JOB SUMMARY
Identify the needs/requirements for Human Resource Department through IT/digital innovation solution to prepare for Coca-Cola Vietnam 2020 Digital Roadmap. Implement successfully assigned Digital Transformation projects to Human Function organizations in order to meet Innovation Strategy of the company. Act as an effective change agent utilizing proper stakeholder analysis and change management techniques to influence Human Resources Function team to implement business process changes and business transformation initiatives successfully

DESCRIPTION
 1. Digital Business Transformation Planning for HR Department
- Develop and drive the HR department’s overall digital transformation strategy and roadmap
- Review existing internal business processes and identify areas of improvement
- Mobilise resource to support the implementation plan 
2. Digital Operational Execution
- Manage multi-Digital Human Resources Function related projects and initiatives across countries and functions successfully deployed as planned 
- Communicate across key stakeholders and monitor execution progress to ensure delivery against business transformation objectives
- Collaborate, influence and partner with Function to make sure transformation agenda executed to create the value 
3. System Integration Management
- Oversee and monitor services used in application integrations
- Design integration solutions and document the design in accordance with best practices
- Work with vendors teams to architect, design, build, and implement application integrations
- Support vendors on resolving system defects, acting as liaison, and developing solutions
- Provide assistant to troubleshoot and resolve integration errors
4. Business Process Improvement
- Perform root cause analysis, identify and define areas for improvement of business processes across all functions
- Grasp the business needs and issues, continuously evaluate the current process to identify the gap
- Propose and drive solution to minimize complexities, optimise and improve business needed for creating value
5. Change Management
- Identify key stakeholders across function and form up change management plan
- Define business case for change and act as a change agent to influence Function Leadership to implement change agenda
- Collaborate, partner, and communicate change plan implementation to all related functions/teams
requirements:
- Bachelor of  IT System; Got knowledge of Digitalization Solution is a plus, MBA IS highly desired 
- 5 years + experience in working with HR Function operations for  leading and facilitating continuous improvement initiatives
- 2 years + experience of system integration implementation
- 2 years + project management experience including experience in SuccessFactors systems implementation 
- HR related systems (HRMS, Payroll, T&A) strong knowledge
- HR business process understand is required
- System integration knowledge and implementation experience in Azure logicapps, dell Boomi etc.
- Customer Service mindset; Operations discipline
- Cross-function Business Process & Concepts Understanding
- Project Management; Problem Solving;
- Data Analytical and Exploitation; Change Management; Organizational Development
- Excellent communication skills (both written and spoken) to demonstrate clear interpretation and presentation of results to various stakeholders
skills: HRIS, HR Systems, Project Management, Fluent English, SAP

We are currently seeking talented individuals to join our team as Web and Graphic Designers. If you have a passion for design and meet the following requirements, we would love to hear from you:

As a Web and Graphic Designer, your primary responsibilities will include providing creative direction and producing graphic design work for online and channel promotional materials. In addition, you will offer graphic design support to our internal marketing teams and collaborate closely with external marketing agencies.

- Proficiency in Photoshop and Illustrator.
- Familiarity with video editing, HTML5, and CSS/Javascript is advantageous.
- Strong command of both spoken and written English and Japanese is advantageous.
- Self-motivated, innovative, and excellent interpersonal skills.

USD 1,500 - USD 2500 per Month

Full-time

• Company events (e.g., company trips)

Please prepare your resume and CV, then submit your application through our online form or via email.
Please also submit the website designs or banner designs you have created in the past

【Other】
We welcome candidates with no industry experience.
If you are motivated, we encourage you to apply!

- Create and put into practice infrastructure automation using technologies like Chef and Ansible

- Knowledge of infrastructure automation tools like Ansible and Chef

- Kiến thức về mô hình cung cấp dịch vụ SOC, mô hình mạng kết nối mạng khách hàng.
- Ưu tiên:
✔ Kiến thức về sản phẩm EDR, SOAR, SIEM mô hình triển khai, các lỗi thường gặp, vận hành sử dụng hệ thống…
✔ Kiến thức về vận hành giám sát cảnh báo ATTT và xử lý sự cố ATTT: khái niệm, các bước triển khai chính.
✔ Kiến thức sử dụng các công cụ phân tích, báo cáo: MSSTOOL, CSO, JIRA....
✔ Alert Triage: Hiểu và sử dụng được kỹ thuật làm giàu dữ liệu và phân tích tương quan để xác định tấn công mạng hoặc dương tính giả (FP)
✔ Ethical hacking: Hiểu các khái niệm cơ bản về Cyber Threats, IoCs, kỹ thuật tấn công và cách thức phát hiện tấn công phổ biến theo Mitre Attack như Recon, BruteForce, Exploit . Hiểu các bước chính trong Cyber Kill Chain
✔ Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm tương tác trực tiếp với khách hàng để hỗ trợ dịch vụ CNTT/ATTT
Kỹ năng:
- Kỹ năng quản lý đội nhóm nhỏ, quy mô từ 3-8 người
- Chỉn chu, quyết đoán
- Có thể đảm bảo trực theo ca kíp

Cơ hội phát triển
- Cơ hội dành cho System/ Network Engineer muốn chuyển ngành sang An toàn thông tin
- Trau dồi kiến thức và kinh nghiệm Xử lý sự cố An toàn thông tin
- Nâng cao kỹ năng quản lý đội nhóm, kinh nghiệm quản lý dịch vụ
- Cơ hội đào tạo chứng chỉ, tham gia khóa học nâng cao chuyên môn
✔ EC-Council Certified Ethical Hacker / OSCP / chứng chỉ tương đương
✔ GIAC Continuous Monitoring Certification (GMON) hoặc GIAC Certified Forensic
Analyst (GCFA) hoặc chứng chỉ tương đương.
✔ Khóa học xử lý vấn đề
✔ Khóa học quản lý điều hành
✔ Khóa học về đảm bảo chất lượng
